mt0: <pad> Okwabika nti abakulembeze b'ekibiina kya Africa National Congress n'abakulembeze b'amagye baaliyo kubanga Masetera yalina omukono.</s>

en: The involvement of powerful personalities from the South African government has caused some rifts in the relationship between the two countries.
lug: Okwenyigiramu kw'abantu ab'amaanyi okuva mu gavumenti ya South Africa kuleeseewo obutakkaanya mu nkolagana wakati w'amawanga abiri.
mt0: <pad> Ugandans abakungu ba South Africa bamanyi nti abantu bamwe mu gavumenti ya South Africa bafatiye ebizibu mu bukolagana bw'amawanga g'ebihugu byombi.</s>

en: Some Rwandan insiders claim it has also biased the investigation into the Kayumba attempted assassination.
lug: Abanyalwanda abamu ab'omunda era bagamba nti kigootaanyizza okunoonyereza ku kugezaako okukuba Kayumba amasasi.
mt0: <pad> Some Rwandan insiders claim it has also biased the investigation into the Kayumba attempted assassination.</s>

en: A Rwandan source, told the Independent that Karegyeya was the one giving South African police tips on whom to arrest.
lug: Ensonda okuva mu Rwanda, yategeezezza Independent nti Karegeya ye yali awa poliisi ya South Africa obubaka ku ani abeera akwatibwa.
mt0: <pad> A Rwandan source, told the Independent that Karegyeya was the one who gave South African police tips on whom to arrest.</s>

en: Gakwerera also claims he was arrested on the advice of Karegyeya.
lug: Gakwerera naye agamba nti yakwatibwa ku magezi ga Karegyeya.
mt0: <pad> Gakwerera also claims he was arrested on the advice of Karegyeya.</s>

en: Further, Rwandan officials have openly accused the South African police of incompetence.
lug: Okwongerako, Abakungu mu Rwanda bazze malumiriza poliisi ya South Africa obutaba na busobozi.
mt0: <pad> Ariko, abakuru b'u Rwanda bavuga ko apolisi b'Afurika y'epfo ntibahagarara mu buzima bw'abantu.</s>

en: They claim that immediately Kayumba was shot, the first people taken to make police statements are those he had in the car.
lug: Bagamba nti amangu ddala nga Kayumba akubiddwa amasasi, abantu abaasooka okutwalibwa okukola sitatimenti ku poliisi be bo be yali nabo mu mmotoka.
mt0: <pad> They say that Kayumba was shot immediately, the first people to be taken to make police statements are those he had in the car.</s>

en: However, a South African diplomat worsened things when he mentioned in an interview that the Rwandan government was behind the shooting.
lug: Wabula, omukungu okuva e South Africa yasajjula ebintu bwe yayogerera mu yintaaviyu nti gavumenti ya Rwanda ye yali mabega w'okukuba amasasi gano.
mt0: <pad> Ariko, umutwe w'umunyafurika y'ebukirabuza yatumye ibintu bimeze nabi ubwo yavugaga mu kiganiro ko leta ya Ruwanda ari yo yari inyuma y'ukubanza.</s>

en: The Kayumba case seems to be setting the relationship between the two nations into a dangerous balance.
lug: Omusango gwa Kayumba gulabise okuteeka enkolagana wakati w'amawanga abiri mu lusuubo olw'obulabe.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba n'agamba nti Uganda n'Uruganda bagenda mu buzima bwabwe.</s>

en: But there is more; the Rwandan government had applied for the deportation of Kayumba on charges of terrorism.
lug: Naye waliwo ekisingawo, gavumenti y'e Rwanda yali esabye okukomyawo Kayumba olw'emisango gy'obuyeekera.
mt0: <pad> Ariko hariho n'ibindi; leta ya Ruwanda yari yasabye ko Kayumba avurwa kubera ibyaha bya terrorism.</s>

en: On April 6, Spain submitted its own application to deport Kayumba on charges of crimes against humanity.
lug: Nga 6 Ogwokuna, Spain yawaayo okusaba kwayo okuzza Kayumba olw'emisango gy'okutyoboola eddembe ly'obuntu.
mt0: <pad> On April 6, Spain submitted its own application to deport Kayumba on charges of crimes against humanity.</s>

en: Two days later, France also applied for the same.
lug: Nga waakayitawo ennaku bbiri Bufalansa nayo yasaba ky'ekimu.
mt0: <pad> 2 days later, France also applied for the same.</s>

en: Kayumba could afford to rubbish Rwanda's claims against him because it is a poor country whose accusations can easily be disregarded.
lug: Kayumba yali asobola okugamba nti Rwanda by'emulumiriza nti tebiriimu nsa kubanga ggwanga lyavu nga bye lyogera bisobola okugaanibwa amangu.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba ashobora kugira amafaranga yo gutera imbere Rwanda mu guhakana ibivugwa kuri we kubera ko Rwanda ni igihugu gikene cy'abakene urashobora kwirengagiza ibivugwa byayo byoroshye.</s>

en: However, France and Spain are powerful nations considered to be mature democracies and reasonable in their actions.
lug: Wabula, Bufalansa ne Spain nsi zikirimaanyi ezitwalibwa okuba ne demokolasiya ow'amaanyi n'ebikolwa eby'amaanyi.
mt0: <pad> Naye France ne Spain ni bihugu by'amaanyi ebiyitibwa okuba nga bitundu bya demokarasi ebyakula n'okukola kwabwe kwogera.</s>

en: So,their applications could carry more weight with South Africa.
lug: N'olw'ekyo, okusaba kwazo kwali kuzito ne South Africa.
mt0: <pad> So,their applications could carry more weight with South Africa.</s>

en: What is clear, however, is that by the time he was shot, Kayumba had begun to reassess his options.
lug: Wabula ekyo ekirabibwako, kirinti mu biseera we yakubibwa amasasi, Kayumba yali atandise okukola okusalawo kwe.
mt0: <pad> kye kimwe, naye, ni nti Kayumba yatandiika gusubiza amabwiriza ye mu gihe yagwa,</s>

en: Deportation applications from Spain and France showed that Kayumba and Kagame shared a stronger common threat.
lug: Bufalansa ne Spain okusaba okumuzza, kyalaga nti Kayumba ne Kagame baalina beerinako okutya okw'amaanyi.
mt0: <pad> Applying for deportation from Spain and France showed that Kayumba and Kagame shared a stronger common threat.</s>

en: This common threat was stronger than the issues that separate them.
lug: Okutya kuno kwali kwa maanyi nnyo okusinga ekibaawula.
mt0: <pad> omuntu omu amanya nti ekibiina kimwe kiba kibi ku bintu bye bigabanyiza.</s>

en: So, he began making contact with Kigali.
lug: N'olw'ekyo yatandika okukwatagana ne Kigali.
mt0: <pad> So, he began making contact with Kigali.</s>

en: Kayumba is a close personal friend to Maj.Gen.Steven Kashaka, currently Uganda's military ambassador to South Africa.
lug: Kayumba mukwano nnyo gwa Maj. Gen. Steven Kashaka nga mu kiseera kino ye mubaka w'amagye ga Uganda mu South Africa.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba ni mugenzi wa muntu w'omutima na Maj.Gen. Steven Kashaka, omubaka wa Uganda mu bufaransa.</s>

en: According to Francis Gakwerera, this thing was engineered by Patrick Karegyeya, the former director of Rwanda's External Security.
lug: Okusinziira ku Francis Gakwerera, kino kyayongerwamu amaanyi Patrick Karegyeya, eyali akulembera ebyokwerinda bya Rwanda eby'ebweru.
mt0: <pad> Francis Gakwerera says, this thing was engineered by Patrick Karegyeya, the former director of Rwanda's External Security.</s>

en: Whenever I travel through South Africa, I meet and talk with Karegyeya because he is also my friend.
lug: Buli lwe ntambula mu South Africa, nsisinkana era ne njogerako ne Karegyeya kubanga naye mukwano gwange.
mt0: <pad> Nsanyukira Karegyeya bwe ntambula mu South Africa kubanga ye omukwano gwange.</s>

en: He sometimes picks me from the airport whenever I get into South Africa.
lug: Ebiseera embimu ankima ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi buli lwe ntuuka mu South Africa.
mt0: <pad> Awo n'akola nti nkomererwa ku ndege bwe ngenda mu South Africa.</s>

en: On this occasion, I got into South Africa on Wednesday and called him on Friday, the day before Kayumba was shot.
lug: Ku mulundi guno, Natuuka mu South Africa ku lwokusatu ne mmukubira ku lwokutaano, olunaku lumu nga tannakubwa masasi.
mt0: <pad> Mu kintu kino, nagenda mu South Africa ku wa gatatu ndamuhamagara ku wagatanu, ku munsi Kayumba yagwa.</s>

en: On Saturday, I had a lunch appointment with Karegyeya which he cancelled saying he was going to watch soccer.
lug: Ku lwomukaga, nalina enteekateeka y'okulya ekyemisana ne Karegyeya naye n'agisazaamu ng'agamba nti yali agenda kulaba mupiira.
mt0: <pad> Nalina ekitabo kya lunch na Karegyeya, kye yakola ku Lwakutaano, kye yagaana agamba nti yali agenda okulaba ekikopo.</s>

en: He later called me saying Kayumba had been shot.
lug: Oluvannyuma n'ankubira ng'agamba nti Kayumba yali akubiddwa esasi n'afa.
mt0: <pad> Anyuma yandihamagara ati Kayumba yagwa mu maaso.</s>

en: I called him thirty minutes later to ask about Kayumba`s state but he said he was busy and promised to call back.
lug: Namukubira oluvannyuma lw'eddakiika asatu okumubuuza ku mbeera Kayumba gye yalimu naye n'agamba nti yali alina by'akolako n'asuubiza okuddamu okunkubira.
mt0: <pad> Ndamukubira nyuma ya maawa 30 kugira ngamba Kayumba's state, naye yagamba nti yali mubuzibu kandi yategeeza ko ajja kunywerera.</s>

en: I was at the home of Albert Gatare, a brother of the late Miko.
lug: Nali mu maka ga Albert Gatare muganda w'omugenzi Miko omulenzi.
mt0: <pad> Nnali mu nnyumba ya Albert Gatare, omuhungu wa Miko ow'oluganda.</s>

en: He told me that Kayumba was in Riverside Hospital.
lug: Yangamba nti Kayumba yali mu ddwaliro ly'e Riverside.
mt0: <pad> Yambwiye nti Kayumba yali mu bitaro bya Riverside.</s>

en: It is at that moment that the police called me and said they wanted me.
lug: Mu kiseera ekyo poliisi yankubira n'engamba nti yali eneetaaga.
mt0: <pad> N'olwo mulundi uwo aba poliisi baakola omusimu n'abagamba nti bansanga.</s>

en: Nine police men then came in heavily armed.
lug: Abasajja aba poliisi mwenda oluvannyuma bajja nga balina ebyokulwanyisa bingi.
mt0: <pad> Nine policemen came in heavily armed.</s>

en: There were many policemen with police dogs.
lug: Waaliwo abapoliisi bangi nga balina embwa za poliisi.
mt0: <pad> Abantu benshi ba poliisi bari n'abambwa ba poliisi.</s>

en: Then on Sunday night, almost 30 hours later, they brought other suspects including Richard who turned out to be Kayumba's driver.
lug: Oluvannyuma ku Sande ekiro, nga waakayita kumpi essaawa amakumi asatu, baaleeta abateeberezebwa abalala omwali ne Richard eyalinga ddereeva wa Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> Naye ku cyumweru, mu masaha 30 amaze, baakola abatuufu abalala nga Richard, eyaba Kayumba's driver.</s>

en: The other suspects included two Rwandans, a Kenyan and a Tanzanian.
lug: Abateeberezebwa abalala mwalimu Abanyalwanda babiri, Omunakenya n'Omutanzaniya.
mt0: <pad> Abantu babiri abandi bagizweko icyaha barimo Abanyarwanda, Kenyan na Tanzania.</s>

en: They asked me if I knew any of the suspects and I knew the two Rwandans.
lug: Baambuuza oba nali manyi omu ku bateeberezebwa nga mmanyi Abanyalwanda ababiri.
mt0: <pad> Bagibaza nimba muzi umwe mu bakurikiranwa, namenye abanyarwanda babiri.</s>

en: He told me that he was actually involved in the shooting of Kayumba.
lug: Yangamba nti yali yeenyigira mu kukuba Kayumba amasasi.
mt0: <pad> Yambwiye nti yali mulimu mu kukwata Kayumba.</s>

en: He said someone called him on telephone saying his name was Dr. Ndahiro.
lug: Yagamba nti waliwo eyamukubira essimu ng'agamba ye dokita Ndahiro.
mt0: <pad> Agamba nti umuntu yamuvuze ku telefone avuga nti yitwa Dr. Ndahiro.</s>

en: He promised to give him two thousand United States dollars if he helped them kill Kayumba that is an enemy of Rwanda.
lug: Yasuubiza okumuwa ddoola z'Amerika enkumi bbiri singa abayambako okutta Kayumba eyali omulabe wa Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Yamuvuze ko yajyaga amupa ibiceri bibiri by'amadolari ya Amerika niba yamufashaga kwica Kayumba, umwansi wa Ruwanda.</s>

en: He said that Dr. Ndahiro promised that the driver would be rewarded by President Paul Kagame if he cooperated.
lug: Yagamba nti dokita Ndahiro yasuubiza nti ddereeva yandisiimiddwa Pulezidenti Paul Kagame singa yali akolaganye nabo.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Ndahiro promised the driver that he would be rewarded by President Paul Kagame if he cooperated.</s>

en: The driver also said that the shooting was the second attempt on Kayumba's life.
lug: Ddereeva naye yagambye nti okukuba amasasi lwe lwali olulumba olwokubiri ku bulamu bwa Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> Awo mugenzi yavugaga ko umuntu yagendaga kugerageza Kayumba's life, a second attempt.</s>

en: Kayumba was sleeping in his bed with his wife.
lug: Kayumba yali yeebase mu buliri ne mukyala we.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba yasinziriye mu buriri n'umugore we.</s>

en: Three days later, he tipped them off when Kayumba and wife were going to the shopping mall.
lug: Ennaku ssatu oluvannyuma, yabatwalako Kayumba ne mukyalawe bwe baali bagenda ku ssemaduuka.
mt0: <pad> 3 days later, he tipped them off when Kayumba and his wife were going to the shopping mall.</s>

en: First, I understood him to be referring to Dr.Emmanuel Ndahiro, the head of the National Security Services.
lug: Okusooka, namutegeera ng'ajuliza ku dokita Emmanuel Ndahiro, akulira National Security Services.
mt0: <pad> First, I understood him to be referring to Dr.Emmanuel Ndahiro, the head of the National Security Services.</s>

en: So, I asked him if he knew this Ndahiro and he said no.
lug: N'olw'ekyo, namubuuza oba nga yali amanyi Ndahiro ono, n'agamba nti nedda.
mt0: <pad> Ndamubaza niba amenya Ndahiro, nawe ati nti siwe.</s>

en: So I asked him why he believed that it was Dr. Ndahiro.
lug: N'olw'ekyo namubuuza lwaki yali asuubira nti ye yali dokita Ndahiro.
mt0: <pad> Ndamubaza nti ni kuki yabona ko Dr. Ndahiro ari we.</s>

en: I was commanding officer of the presidential guard of rebel leader and later President Laurent Kabila.
lug: Nze nali omuduumizi w'eggye erikuuma Pulezidenti w'abayeekera n'oluvannyuma eyafuuka Loteenanti Kabila.
mt0: <pad> Nnali omukulembeze w'abasirikare b'umukuru w'amagye y'umuyobozi Laurent Kabila, eyabaye umukuru w'amagye n'ebyo kubanga y'ubutegetsi.</s>

en: So I know, the story of Kayumba's shooting is all deceptive.
lug: N'olw'ekyo nkimanyi nti emboozi y'okukuba Kayumba amasasi yonna enyumizibwa bunyumizibwa.
mt0: <pad> Nk'okumanya, ebyo bya Kayumba byakola ni byonna nsonga.</s>

en: Then the killer went over to the side of Kayumba and they had a physical fight.
lug: Awo omutemu n'agenda eri Kayumba ne batandika okulwana.
mt0: <pad> Awo omutemu yaje ku ruhande rwa Kayumba, n'ababiri baakola intambara.</s>

en: We were then transferred to John Foster Prison on Monday.
lug: Oluvannyuma ku Mmande twatwalibwa mu kkomera lya John Foster.
mt0: <pad> Twabatwala e John Foster Prison ku Lwakutaano.</s>

en: Kayumba's driver recorded his statement in my presence and he repeated to the police what he had told me in jail.
lug: Ddereeva wa Kayumba yakola siteetimenti ye nga wendi era n'addamu okugamba poliisi bye yali ang'ambye mu kkomera.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba's driver recorded his statement in my presence and he repeated to the police what he had told me in jail.</s>

en: These people were not victimized in any way after the overthrow of Amin.
lug: Abantu bano tebaavunaanibwa oluvannyuma lw'okuggyako Amin.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bano tebaakola mu ngeri y'okukola ebibi nyuma ya Amin.</s>

en: But there was evidence against them that they aided Amin in Killing Uganda People's Congress members.
lug: Naye waaliwo obujulizi obubalumiriza nti baayambako Amin mu kutta bammemba ba Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> But there was evidence against them that they aided Amin in Killing Uganda People's Congress members.</s>

en: Let Kahigiriza come here and contradict my words, if what I say is not correct.
lug: Leka Kahigiriza ajje wano awakanye ebigambo byange, bwe mba nga bye njogera si bituufu.
mt0: <pad> Let Kahigiriza come here and contradict my words, if what I say is not correct.</s>

en: While addressing another rally in Buzabo's constituency, Muwanga warned saying;
lug: Bwe yabadde ng'ayogera mu lukungaana olulala mu konsitituwensi ya Buzabo, Muwanga yalabudde ng'agamba;
mt0: <pad> Muwanga yagambye nti mu gihe yategerezaga akatabo kabwe mu kitundu kya Buzabo, Muwanga yagamba ati: "Mubanga n'abavuga nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mugomba kumenya nti muba mu

en: "Take the message to Buzabo and all the Democratic Party supporters that they must stop the dirty politics immediately".
lug: Twala obubaka eri Buzabo n'abawagizi ba Democratic Party nti bateekeddwa okukomya ebyobufuzi byabwe eby'emivuyo mu bunnambiro.
mt0: <pad> "Mutume ekirabo ku Buzabo na baganda bonna aba Democratic Party nti bagamba nti bagenda kugwa mu by'obufuzi bwabwe n'okukola ebiragiro byabwe."</s>

en: The liberty which was brought by the Uganda People's Congress cost people's lives some died in Lake Victoria, others between Mutukula and Arua.
lug: Eddembe eryaleetebwa Uganda people's congress lyaviirako abantu bangi okufiirwa obulamu bwabwe abamu baafiira mu nnyanja Nalubaale abalala wakati wa Mutukula ne Arua.
mt0: <pad> Uganda People's Congress ebyaleta obw'okuyingira mu buzima bw'abantu, bamwe bafa mu Lake Victoria, abalala wakati wa Mutukula na Arua.</s>

en: They sacrificed their lives for the freedom of everyone in Uganda.
lug: Baasaddaaka obulamu bwabwe ku lw'eddembe lya buli omu ali mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Bagiraga omubiri wabo kugira bamuwe Uganda yose amazzi.</s>

en: Muwanga warned that, members of different parties should not claim to have an upper hand on others by molesting them.
lug: Muwanga yalabude nti bammemba b'ebibiina eby'enjawulo tebateekeddwa kukaayana kubaamu na mukono ogwawaggulu nga banyiiza abalala.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga warned that, members of different parties should not pretend to have an upper hand on others by molesting them.</s>

en: Muwanga talked to the Uganda people's Congress in Mbirizi, Masaka South-West constituency.
lug: Muwanga yayogeddeko eri Uganda People's Congress e Mbirizi mu konsitituwensi ya Masaka South-West.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga spoke to the Uganda people's Congress in Mbirizi, Masaka South-West constituency.</s>

en: The 65 year old chairman who effectively participated in last years' liberation war which toppled Amin said:
lug: Ssentebe w'emyaka 65 omwaka oguwedde eyeenyigira obutereevu mu lutalo lw'ameenunula olw'aggyako Amin yagambye;
mt0: <pad> Omuzadde ow'emyaka 65 eyali mulimu mu buganda obw'okulumba Amin, yagamba nti Uganda n'ebyo byakola mu kulumba kwabwe okudduka Amin.</s>

en: "You the youth of Uganda People's Congress will spearhead the reconstruction and development task".
lug: Mwe abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress mujja kukulemberamu omulimu gw'okuzzaawo awamu n'okulaakulanya.
mt0: <pad> "Mu Uganda People's Congress, muba mukikola ekifo ky'okuzimba n'okutekawo."</s>

en: "The first thing the Uganda People's Congress will do as soon as it comes to power will be to engage the youth in productive work.
lug: Ekintu ekisooka Uganda People's Congress ky'ejja okusookera ddala okukola ng'ezze mu buyinza kujja kuba kunyigira bavubuka mu mirimu egizimba.
mt0: <pad> "Ikintu ekyokusatu Uganda People's Congress ikoze nga yamara ku butegetsi ni ukubatisha abato mu bukola obw'okukola.</s>

en: Uganda People's Congress youths will spearhead this so as to set an example to the rest.
lug: Abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress bajja kukulemberamu kino okusobola okuteekawo ekyokulabirako eri abalala.
mt0: <pad> Uganda People's Congress youths will lead this so as to set an example to the rest.</s>

en: Muwanga also appealed to Ugandans to strive hard and establish mutual respect for each other.
lug: Muwanga era yasaba bannayuganda okufuba ennyo okwewangana ekitiibwa.
mt0: <pad> Muwanga also urged Ugandans to strive hard and establish mutual respect for each other.</s>

en: At Bwezibwera, the chairman pledged, never again shall the Uganda People's Congress allow Uganda to be humiliated as it was in the Amin's days.
lug: E Bwezibwera, ssentebe yeeyamye, aba Uganda People's Congress tebajja kuddamu kukkiriza Uganda okuddamu okujoogebwa nga bwe kyali mu biseera bya Amin.
mt0: <pad> At Bwezibwera, the chairman promised, never again shall the Uganda People's Congress allow Uganda to be humiliated as it was in the days of Amin.</s>

en: Never shall Uganda be characterized with the life of scarcities of essential commodities.
lug: Uganda teribeera mu mbeera ya bbulwa ly'ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.
mt0: <pad> Nti Uganda igomba kubanga na buli kintu ky'obutonde bw'ebikozesebwa mu Uganda.</s>

en: Uganda People's Congress needs determined characters who would stand with this nation even in difficult times.
lug: Uganda People's Congress yeetaaga abantu abamalirivu abanaayimirira nayo ne mu biseera ebizibu.
mt0: <pad> Uganda People's Congress needs determined characters who would stand with this nation even in difficult times.</s>

en: Commenting on the Democratic Party led by Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, he said it was characterized by contradictions.
lug: Okwogera ku Democratic Party ekulirwa Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, yagambye nti kwalimu okukontana.
mt0: <pad> About the Democratic Party led by Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, he said it was characterized by contradictions.</s>

en: He commended Semogerere for his ability to lead a party which was almost torn apart by contradictions.
lug: Yasembye Semogerere ku lw'obusobozi bwe okukulembera ekibiina ekyali kumpi kitaaguddwataaguddwa okwetema engalize.
mt0: <pad> Okwagala Semogerere kwali kwogera nti yakola ebyo byakola ekitundu ky'abantu ekyalinga kigabanyijwe n'amazima.</s>

en: The Democratic Party, serious contender with the Uganda People's Congress in the polls, had given away more that 10 parliamentary seats.
lug: Democratic party eyali evuganya ennyo ne Uganda People's Congress mu kalulu, yali eviiriddwako ebifo bya paalamenti ebisukka 10.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party, a serious contender with the Uganda People's Congress in the polls, had lost more than 10 parliamentary seats.</s>

en: I tend to think that Semogerere is only unfortunate to lead such men.
lug: Ngenda ne ndowooza nti Semogerere talina bubeezi mukisa ku kulembera bantu ng'abo.
mt0: <pad> Ndowooza nti Semogerere n'akola mu bubi okukola abantu nga abo.</s>

en: Otherwise, how can we have the 1980 parliamentary candidates who cannot fill in the forms and present them in time?
lug: Mu ngeri endala, tusobola tutya okuba n'abavuganya ku bubaka bwa paalamenti mu 1980 nga tebasobola kujjuza mpapula ne baziwaayo mu budde.
mt0: <pad> N'olwo, bwe tubona abateberezebwa mu 1980 abatayagala kukwata ama fomu no kuzitwala mubiseera?</s>

en: Nakasi's story is heartbreaking.
lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi emenya omutima.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi's story is heartbreaking.</s>

en: This series is compiled and reproduced by John Njoroge.
lug: Obutundutundu buno bwakungaanyiziddwa era ne buddamu okufulumizibwa John Njoroge.
mt0: <pad> Please translate this series by John Njoroge.</s>

en: According to the independent issued on Jul 30- August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire reported that;
lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana 2010, Rosebell Kagumire yagamba nti;
mt0: <pad> According to the independent issued on Jul 30- August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire reported that;</s>

en: A young woman who was returning home outside the countryside town of Soroti was raped.
lug: Omuwala eyabadde adda ewaka wabweru w'ekibuga kya Soroti yasobezeddwako.
mt0: <pad> Akazi muto yagabwe mu buganda bw'e Soroti ubwo yagaruka mu kibuga kye.</s>

en: The 28 year old Grace Nakasi was a victim of an insurgency in eastern Uganda.
lug: Grace Nakasi ow'emyaka 28 yakosebwa akatabanguko mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Grace Nakasi, 28, a victim of an insurgency in east Uganda.</s>

en: She was pulled off the road to the bush and gang-raped by the men in uniform.
lug: Yasikiddwa okuva ku kkubo n'atwalibwa mu nsiko n'asobezebwako ekibinja ky'abasajja abaali mu yunifomu.
mt0: <pad> Akazibwa n'abagabo mu maaso g'ebyabakungu, n'abakwatiddwa mu kibira.</s>

en: I was living in Soroti town.
lug: Nali mbeera mu kibuga ky'e Soroti.
mt0: <pad> Nnabeera mu kibuga kya Soroti.</s>

en: I met nine soldiers on patrol at about 7:00 pm.
lug: Nasisinkanye abajaasi mwenda ku paatulo ku ssaawa nga 7:00 ez'ekawungeezi.
mt0: <pad> Nkwatagana n'abasirikare musanvu ku mukolo gwa 7:00 pm.</s>

en: Nakasi begins her story by narrating how they all raped her and abandoned by the roadside.
lug: Nakasi atandika emboozi ye ng'attottola engeri bonna gye baamusobyako ne bamuleka ku mabbali g'ekkubo.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi atandika ebyo byakola mu kugamba nti bwe bamukolera n'okumusiba ku makubo.</s>

en: This was 1987, a year after President Yoweri Museveni had captured the reigns of state power.
lug: Guno gwali mwaka gwa 1987, nga Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni awambye obuyinza bw'eggwanga.
mt0: <pad> It was 1987, a year after President Yoweri Museveni had captured the reigns of state power.</s>

en: He announced "a fundamental change", not a mere change of guard.
lug: Yalangirira enkyukakyuka ey'omuggundu so si kukyusa bukyusa bakuumi.
mt0: <pad> Okwa mbere, yatangaje "okukyuusa ekifo", si kukyuusa eby'obufuzi.</s>

en: The heinous incident marked the dawn of repeated sexual violence against Nakasi and many other women in conflict areas.
lug: Akaseera k'entiisa kano ke kaali entandikwa y'okusobya ku Nakasi entakera n'abakyala abalala abaali mu bitundu ebirimu obutabanguko.
mt0: <pad> The heinous incident marked the dawn of repeated sexual violence against Nakasi and many other women in conflict areas.</s>

en: "I decided to go to the bus park to take a bus to visit my home," Nakasi narrates with suppressed sadness.
lug: Nasazeewo okugenda mu paaka ya bbaasi nninnye bbaasi ngende ewange, Nakasi anyumya nga munakuwavu.
mt0: <pad> "Nnaakola nti nagenda mu kibuga ky'amaato kukwata amaato okugenda mu maka gange," Nakasi yagambye n'okusiiga omutima.</s>

en: It was on the way to the bus park that Nakasi became a victim of the second rape.
lug: Nakasi  asobezebweko omulundi ogwokubiri ku lugendo lwe okutuuka ku paaka ya bbaasi .
mt0: <pad> Nakasi yagwa mubuzibu eky'okubikulirwa ekyokubiri kunzira eyali eri ekibuga cy'amaato.</s>

en: Nakasi narrated, "I met four National Resistance Army soldiers, two of them dragged me off the road and forced themselves on me".
lug: Nakasi ya ttotodde, "nasisinkanye abajaasi ba National Resistance Movement bana, babiri ku bo ne bansika okuva ku luguudo ne banneekakaatikako."
mt0: <pad> Nakasi narrated, "Nnaakolagana n'abasirikare bane ba National Resistance Army, ababiri bamwe batwalira ku muhanda ne bagamba nti bwe bayinza kubabanga.</s>

en: Nakasi a mother of 12 children, a resident of Soroti, was raped 16 times, infected with HIV.
lug: Nakasi maama ow'abaana 12, mutuuze w'e Soroti, yasobezebwako emirundi 16, n'asiigibwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi, maama wa baana 12, omutuukirivu mu Soroti, yakwatiddwa 16 n'okukolagana na HIV, agulwadde n'obulwadde bwa AIDS.</s>

en: She was later thrown out of her marital home by the enraged husband.
lug: Oluvannyuma yagobebwa baawe omunyiivu mu maka ge ag'empeta.
mt0: <pad> Awo amaze okumutwala mu maka ge n'omugabo we eyali amaze kumumenya.</s>

en: It's a touching narrative and a wider reflection of the tribulations women face in Africa's conflict-torn regions.
lug: Yabadde mboozi ekwata ku muntu nga yeefumiitiriza ku kaseera akazibu abakazi ke basanga mu bifo bya Afirika ebirimu obutabanguko.
mt0: <pad> It's a touching story and a wider reflection of the tribulations women face in Africa's conflict-torn regions.</s>

en: She is one of the faces of Ugandan women that carry the burden of sexual violence.
lug: Y'omu ku bakyala abannayuganda abasanga ekizibu ky'okukabassanyizibwa.
mt0: <pad> She is one of the faces of Ugandan women who bear the burden of sexual violence.</s>

en: For the past decade Uganda has been applauded on the world stage as a successful story in the fight against Human immunodeficiency Virus.
lug: Mu kyasa ekiyise, Uganda ebadde etenderezebwa ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna ng'erina emboozi ey'obuwanguzi mu kulwanyisa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.
mt0: <pad> Uganda amaze imyaka 10 ebiri y'okusikira mu nsi yonna nga ekibuga ekikubira mu kulwanagana na HIV.</s>

en: Women trapped between government soldiers and the LRA rebels have borne the brunt of the HIV.
lug: Abakyala abakwatibwa wakati w'abajaasi ba gavumenti n'abayeekera ba LRA be bali ennyo mu buzibu bw'okukwatibwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.
mt0: <pad> Akazi akazanyidwa wakati w'abasirikare ba gavumenti n'aba LRA bagoberera ebizibu bya HIV.</s>

en: This is more than any other women in the rest of the country.
lug: Kino kisinga omukyala omulala yenna mu ggwanga lyonna.
mt0: <pad> 'Omukazi oyo agendera mu buganda kurusha abagore bonna mu nsi yonna.</s>

en: The prevalent sexual violence by both the LRA and government soldiers has left behind a traumatized and stressed generation of women.
lug: Okukabassanya okugenda mu maaso okwa LRA n'abajaasi ba gavumenti kulese omujiji gw'abakyala nga bali mu kikangabwa n'obweraliikirivu.
mt0: <pad> Gender-based violence by both the LRA and government soldiers has left behind a traumatized and stressed generation of women.</s>

en: In 1990, Nakasi was again gang-raped by men whom she believes were government soldiers.
lug: Mu 1990, Nakasi era yaddamu okusobezebwako b'akkiriza nti baali bajaasi ba gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> Mu 1990, Nakasi yagabwe mu buganda n'abantu bamwe agamba ko baali abasirikari b'ubutegetsi.</s>

en: She was admitted to Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital in Kampala for several months after the rape incident.
lug: Yaweebwa ekitanda ku Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital mu kampala okumala emyezi egiwera oluvannyuma lw'okukabassanyizibwa.
mt0: <pad> She was admitted to Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital in Kampala for several months after the rape incident.</s>

en: In 2002, Nakasi took an HIV test.
lug: Mu 2002, Nakasi yeekebeza akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.
mt0: <pad> Mu 2002, Nakasi yakola ekifo kya HIV.</s>

en: But the day I told him I had tested HIV positive, he threw me out of the house, Nakasi narrates in a tone of courage that has defied many odds.
lug: Naye olunaku lwe namugamba nti nazuuliddwamu akawuka akaleeta mukenenya, yanfulumya mu nnyumba, Nakasi attottola mu ddoboozi ery'obuvumu ekyewuunyisa abantu bangi.
mt0: <pad> Naye bwe namubuulira nti nali mwererewe HIV, yankubita mu nnyumba, Nakasi agamba mu ngeri y'obutwari eyatwala abantu benshi.</s>

en: Nakasi was excommunicated from the community.
lug: Nakasi yasosolebwa mu kitundu.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi yakwatiddwa mu bantu.</s>

en: A ray of hope emerged in 2007.
lug: Oluwenda lw'essuubi lwaliwo mu 2007.
mt0: <pad> A ray of hope emerged in 2007.</s>

en: Nakasi was rescued by World Vision International which paid for her operation to remove her uterus which helps eliminate the fistula condition.
lug: Nakasi yanunulibwa aba World Vision International abaasasulira okulongosebwa kwe okuggyibwamu nabaana ekyamuyamba okuwona embeera y'ekikulukuto.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi yasobozeswa World Vision International eyakoze omulimu wo kuggya omusango gwe mu mubiri we okuwonya ekifo kye ekikola nti ekimuza ekizibu ky'okukola fistula.</s>

en: After the treatment, she and other women, who are victims of sexual violence, started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.
lug: Oluvannyuma lw'obujjanjabi, ye n'abakyala abalala abaakosebwa okukabassanyizibwa, baatandikawo ekibiina ekiyambi ekiyitibwa Teso Peace Women's Activists.
mt0: <pad> Awo amaze okukola, ye ne bakazi abalala abaali baferwako mu ngeri ya busambatuko, batandika ekipi y'abakungu b'abakazi abatuukirira abakazi.</s>

en: According to the Independent issue of July 30-August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote about women and girls who are abandoned after rape.
lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana 2010, Rosebell Kagumi yawandiika ku bakazi n'abawala abasuulibwawo oluvannyuma lw'okukabassanyizibwa.
mt0: <pad> According to the Independent issue of July 30-August 5, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote about women and girls who are abandoned after rape.</s>

en: Nakasi said the young girl's parents died in the war and now at nine no one wants to take care of her yet has six orphans under her care.
lug: Nakasi yagambye, bazadde b'omuwala omuto baafiira mu lutalo era kati ku myaka mwenda tewali n'omu ayagala kumulabirira kyokka ng'alina bamulekwa mukaaga b'alabirira.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi said the girl's parents died in the war and now at nine no one wants to take care of her yet has six orphans under her care.</s>

en: Nakasi's story is not unique in Uganda's war-ravaged communities.
lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi si mpya mu bitundu bya Uganda ebyakosebwa olutalo.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi's story is not unique in Uganda's war-ravaged community.</s>

en: She told the Independent that about 40 women within just one sub-county of Tubur in Soroti where she works suffer from vaginal fistula.
lug: Yagambye Independent nti abakyala abakunukkiriza 40 mu ggombolola emu yokka eya Tubur mu Soroti gy'akolera balwadde ba kikulukuto.
mt0: <pad> She told the Independent that about 40 women in just one sub-county of Tubur in Soroti where she works suffer from vaginal fistula.</s>

en: This is due to rape.
lug: Kino kiva ku kukabassanyizibwa.
mt0: <pad> kyo kikwata ku ggwa.</s>

en: Nakasi and other HIV- positive women regularly walk many miles from Tubur to get life pronging drugs.
lug: Nakasi n'abakazi abalala abalina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya batambula mmayiro nyingi okuva e Tubur okufuna eddagala eribeezaawo obulamu.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi n'abakazi abalina HIV-positive bagendera mu makubo amakumi g'emyaalo okuva Tubur okujjako imiti ey'okukolaho obulamu.</s>

en: Nakasi has managed to get funds from Women's International Cross-Cultural Exchange and Urgent Action Fund Africa.
lug: Nakasi asobodde okufuna obuyambi okuva mu Women's International Cross Cultural Exchange and Urgent Action Fund Africa.
mt0: <pad> Nakasi amaze kukwata amaguzi okuva mu Women's International Cross-Cultural Exchange ne Urgent Action Fund Africa.</s>

en: These funds help orphans and provide medicines to people living with HIV in her village.
lug: Obuyambi buno buyamba bamulekwa n'okuwa abantu eddagala abayina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya mu kyalo kye .
mt0: <pad> Uganda ebyo bikubira abaavu n'okugaba amazima kubantu abalina HIV mu kibuga kye.</s>

en: It became clear that the new government was there to stay after the late 1990's.
lug: Kyategeerekeka nti gavumenti empya yali ya kubeerawo oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gya lukumi mu lwenda kyenda egyasembayo.
mt0: <pad> It became clear that the new government was there to stay after the late 1990s.</s>

en: Until then, the Rwandan Patriotic Front had managed to run the country through sheer ingenuity.
lug: Okutuuka olwo, Rwanda Patriotic Front yali esobodde okuddukanya eggwanga ng'eyita mu kugonjoola ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
mt0: <pad> Until then, the Rwandan Patriotic Front had managed to run the country through sheer ingenuity.</s>

en: A small and poor country grappling with problems of the magnitude Rwanda has faced in recently;
lug: Ensi entono era enjavu zirwanagana n'ebizibu eby'enjawulo Rwanda by'eyiseemu gye buvuddeko.
mt0: <pad> A small and poor country grappling with problems of the magnitude Rwanda has faced in recently.</s>

en: And still faces today cannot be considered normal.
lug: Era n'okutuusa kati ffeesi tezisobola kutegeerekeka.
mt0: <pad> N'okugeza nti abantu b'obudde mu kiseera kino tebaakola nga babiri.</s>

en: Most people who visit Rwanda marvel at how clean and orderly Kigali is compared to cities elsewhere in the region and beyond.
lug: Abantu abasinga abagenda e Rwanda beewuunya engeri ekibuga Kigali gye kiri ekiyonjo n'engeri gye kyateekebwateekebwamu.
mt0: <pad> Most people who visit Rwanda marvel at how clean and orderly Kigali is compared to other cities in the region and beyond.</s>

en: Remembering his childhood in clean and orderly Entebbe;
lug: Ajjukira obuto bwe mu kibuga Entebbe ekiyonjo era enteeketeeke.
mt0: <pad> Remembering his childhood in clean and orderly Entebbe</s>

en: Kalyegira arguably has grounds for asserting that there is nothing impressive about the state Kigali is in.
lug: Kalyegira agamba alina obukakafu nti tewali kisikiriza ku mbeera Kigali gy'erimu.
mt0: <pad> Kalyegira arguably has grounds for asserting that there is nothing impressive about the state Kigali is in.</s>

en: Nonetheless, that Kigali is the only Rwandan town talked about in these terms merely reflects that many visitors do not venture beyond it.
lug: Ngy'oggyeeko ekyo, Kigali kye kibuga kya Rwanda kyokka ekyogerwako mu mbeera zino, ekiraga nti abagenyi bangi tebalambula kukisukka.
mt0: <pad> Nubwo Kigali ari wo mujyi wa Ruwanda uvuga mu majambo aya gusa, bivuze ko abagenzi benshi batagera kure yaho.</s>

en: Kigali is not the only clean and orderly town in Rwanda.
lug: Kigali si kye kibuga kyokka ekiyonjo era ekiteeketeeke mu Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Kigali si igisagara kimwe c'amahoro kandi gitegekanijwe mu Rwanda.</s>

en: He has traversed Rwanda over the last decade sometimes as a visitor, other times as a researcher.
lug: Alambudde Rwanda okumala emyaka kkumi egiyise oluusi ng'omugenyi, ebiseera ebirala ng'omunoonyereza.
mt0: <pad> He has been a visitor to Rwanda for the last 10 years, sometimes as a researcher, other times as a visitor.</s>

en: My adventures have allowed me to observe different aspects of life in Rwanda at close range.
lug: Okulambula kwange kunsobozesezza okulaba ebintu eby'enjawulo mu Rwanda nga mbiri kumpi.
mt0: <pad> My adventures have allowed me to observe different aspects of life in Rwanda at close range.</s>

en: A perceptive visitor to any place in Rwanda cannot fail to notice evidence of the high quality of public administration the country.
lug: Omugenyi omwekkaanyi mu kifo kyonna e Rwanda tayinza kulemwa kulaba mutindo ogwa waggulu ogw'okukulemberamu abantu mu ggwanga eryo.
mt0: <pad> A visitor to any place in Rwanda cannot fail to notice evidence of the high quality of public administration the country.</s>

en: Also the service delivery in the country.
lug: N'obuweereza obuliwo mu ggwanga.
mt0: <pad> Also the service delivery in the country.</s>

en: The regular cleaning and garbage collection seen in Kigali is, for example, evident in towns, big and small across the country.
lug: Okulongoosa okwa buli lunaku n'okukung'aanya kasasiro okulabibwa mu Kigali, okugeza kirabibwako mu bibuga, ebinene n'ebitono okwetoloola eggwanga.
mt0: <pad> The regular cleaning and garbage collection seen in Kigali is, for example, evident in towns, big and small across the country.</s>

en: The reason why all this is impressive is not because it happens only in Rwanda, or that it has never happened anywhere else.
lug: Ensonga lwaki kino kisikiriza teri nti kubanga kiri Rwanda yokka, oba nti tekibangawo awantu awalala wonna.
mt0: <pad> Ntago icyo kintu cyose gitangaje ni uko kiba kiba mu Rwanda gusa, cyangwa ko kitarigeze kiba ahandi.</s>

en: Rather, it is because it happens in a country which only 16 years ago was expected to dig itself deeper into chaos and violence.
lug: Wabula, kiri nti lwakuba kiri mu ggwanga eryali lisuubirwa okwenyigira mu mivuyo n'obutabanguko mu myaka kkumi na mukaaga gyokka egiyise.
mt0: <pad> N'olwokuba nti kiba mu nsi y'abantu abamu babiri gusa, ebyo biva mu nsi eyategerezwa kugwa mu bugumu n'amakimbirane mu myaka 16 egisooka.</s>

en: Thus add a new statistic to Africa's many failed and failing states.
lug: N'olw'ekyo gatta omuwendo omuggya ku nsi za Afirika ennyingi eziremereddwa n'eziremererwa.
mt0: <pad> N'olwekyo yongera omusango omulala ku bihugu bya Afirika bye byatagendaga ne bitagendaga.</s>

en: Only RPF cadres and RPA soldiers who had organised a war and successfully defeated a better equiped and resourced army;
lug: Akabinja ka RPF n'abajaasi ba RPA bokka abaali bateeseteese olutalo ne bawangula eggye eryali teteekeddwateekeddwa obulungi era nga lirina buli kyakukozesa.
mt0: <pad> Only RPF cadres and RPA soldiers had organised a war and successfully defeated a better equiped and resourced army.</s>

en: Expected to see a functioning and effective state in less than a generation.
lug: Suubira okulaba eggwanga eritambuzibwa obulungi ng'omugigi tegunnayitawo.
mt0: <pad> Uganda ekyali kigenda kubanga ekitundu ekyakola n'ekigendererwa mu myaka ntono.</s>

en: Most rural folks possess medical insurance which entitles them to quality services which their counterparts in neighbouring countries.
lug: Abantu b'omu byalo abasinga balina yinsuwa z'obulamu ekibayamba okufuna obuweereza obulungi ekiringa ne bannaabwe abali mu nsi ez'oku muliraano.
mt0: <pad> Most rural people have medical insurance which entitles them to quality services which their counterparts in neighboring countries.</s>

en: These include countries like Uganda, could not possibly expect.
lug: Muno mulimu amawanga nga Uganda, agatasuubirwa.
mt0: <pad> Uganda, nga Uganda, nti n'omuntu yagaruka ategereze.</s>

en: In health sphere, Rwandans do not expect to offer bribes to public servants employed to deliver services to which they are entitled.
lug: Mu byobulamu, Abanyalwanda tebasuubira kugulirira bakozi ba gavumenti abasuubirwa okutuusa obuweereza bwe bateekeddwa okutuusa.
mt0: <pad> Mu rwego rw'ubuvuzi, Abanyarwanda ntibazateganya gutanga amabanga ku bakozi b'igihugu bakora mu gutanga serivisi zose zikwiye.</s>

en: Given the country's demographics, most of the beneficiaries of these advances are members of the majority Hutu population.
lug: Okusinziira ku muwendo gwabwe, abasinga okuganyulwa mu buweereza buno be Bahutu abasinga obungi.
mt0: <pad> Given the country's demographics, most of the beneficiaries of these advances are members of the majority Hutu population.</s>

en: This is thanks to propaganda by past regimes.
lug: Kino kwebaza eri abasaasaanya amawulire agalaliiko mitwe na magulu mu mirembe egyayita.
mt0: <pad> Ugandans arendaga nti abantu bamanyi nti Uganda y'abanyarwanda.</s>

en: Commentators of a particular bent may sneer at the Rwanda government's democratic credentials.
lug: Batunuulizi bandyekkaanya engeri Rwanda gy'ekwatamu ensonga ya Demokulasiya.
mt0: <pad> Commentators of a particular bent may sneer at the Rwanda government's democratic credentials.</s>

en: In Rwanda, police and army officers do not make political statements praising the Rwanda Political Front or criticising its opponents.
lug: Mu Rwanda, poliisi n'abaamagye teboogera siteetimenti za byabufuzi nga batendereza Rwanda Political Front oba okukolokota abagivuganya.
mt0: <pad> Mu Rwanda, abapolisi n'abasirikare batavuga amagambo ya politiki ashima Rwanda Political Front cyangwa gutamanya abayobozi bagenzi be.</s>

en: Hutu and Tutsi who qualify under the law are free to participate, without restriction or special privileges linked to ethnicity.
lug: Abahutu n'Abatuusi abatuukiriza eteeka ba ddembe okwetaba awatali kukugirwa oba okuweebwa ekintu kyonna nga kyesigamizibwa ku ggwanga.
mt0: <pad> Hutu na Tutsi abakola mu mateeka bafise obwenkomerero bwo kukwatagana, nga tebategekebwa kubanga nti abakungu b'obuganda balina ebintu by'enjawulo ebikwata ku buganda.</s>

en: They can participate as candidates or supporters of any of the country's legally registered political parties.
lug: Basobola okwesimbawo oba okuwagira ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi byonna ebyawandiisibwa mu mateeka.
mt0: <pad> Osobola okukola mu ngeri y'okulonda nga bavuganya oba abatambuze ba buli parti ya politiki ey'obutonde bw'omu gwanga.</s>

en: Journalists working for state media are not fired for hosting leaders of parties other than the Rwanda Political Front.
lug: Bannamawulire abakolera omukutu gw'eggwanga tebagobebwa olw'okukyaza abakulu b'ebibiina abatali ba Rwanda Political Front.
mt0: <pad> Journalists working for state media are not fired for hosting leaders of parties other than the Rwanda Political Front.</s>

en: Under the supremacist Habyarimana and Kayibanda regimes this kind of freedom for all' was unthinkable.
lug: Mu mirembe gya Supremacist Habyarimana ne Kayibanda, eddembe lya bonna nga lino lyali terirowoozebwako.
mt0: <pad> Under the Habyarimana and Kayibanda supremacist regimes this kind of 'freedom for all' was unthinkable.</s>

en: Another sphere in which the robustness of the Rwanda state can be discerned is law enforcement.
lug: Embeera endala eyeenyumirizibwamu mu ggwanga lya Rwanda eri mu kwasisa y'amateeka.
mt0: <pad> Rwanda nayo igira uburyo bukomeye mu gukubita amategeko.</s>

en: In some, including several of Rwanda's neighbours, having laws on the statute books is one thing, enforcement is another.
lug: Mu zimu, nga mw'otwalidde ne baliraanwa ba Rwanda abawerako, okubeera n'amateeka mu bitabo kirala n'okugakwasisa kirala.
mt0: <pad> Mu bamwe, harimo n'abaturage ba Ruwanda benshi, kugira amategeko mu gitabo ni kimwe, gukurikizwa ni ikindi.</s>

en: In Rwanda, the state's willingness and capacity for law enforcement explains why the impunity which some of us have come to accept.
lug: Mu Rwanda, embeera y'okweyagalira n'obusobozi bw'okukwasisa amateeka kinnyonnyola lwaki tusobola okukkiriza obutabonerezebwa.
mt0: <pad> Mu Rwanda, ubushake bw'igihugu n'ubushobozi bwacyo mu gukubita amategeko buvuga impamvu impunity imwe muri twebwe twaje gutakira.</s>

en: It explains it as a fact of life in our countries is virtually unknown.
lug: Kikinnyonnyola ng'eky'amazima mu nsi zaffe ekitamanyiddwa.
mt0: <pad> It explains it as a fact of life in our countries is virtually unknown.</s>

en: There are no untouchables, which explains why, regardless of what they may think of President Kagame as individuals.
lug: Tewali bannantakwatwako, ekinnyonnyola lwaki, ne bw'oba nga ki ky'olowooleza Pulezidenti Kagame ng'omuntu.
mt0: <pad> No untouchables, which explains why, regardless of what they may think of President Kagame as individuals.</s>

en: Then there are those who think he could be less strict and more compromising.
lug: Era waliwo abo abalowooza nti ayinza okuba omugonvu oba obutafa kw'ekyo kye bakoze.
mt0: <pad> Awo bwe baagala nti yali asobola okubeera omuzira n'okukolagana.</s>

en: There are also no cases of the high and mighty erecting buildings in total disregard of planning regulations and suffering no consequences.
lug: Era tewaliiwo misango gya kugaana bizimbe bizimbiddwa nga tebiri ku ppulaani n'obutakozebwa bivaamu.
mt0: <pad> Nti waliwo n'ebintu bya bagagga abakola amayinja mu burengero bw'amategeko g'okuteekamu ebyuma mu butuufu bwabwe, nga tebalina nsonga.</s>

en: And yet others have theirs demolished.
lug: Ate ng'abalala ebyabwe bisaanyiziddwawo.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bangi nti baabwe bamaze okumenya.</s>

en: Important personalities and ordinary folk, Hutu and Tutsi, soldier and civilian, all live in equal fear of, and respect for, the law.
lug: Abantu ab'omugaso n'aba bulijjo, Abahutu n'Abatuusi, abajaasi n'abantu ba bulijjo banna babeera mu kutya kwe kumu n'okussa ekitiibwa mu mateeka.
mt0: <pad> Important personalities and ordinary folk, Hutu and Tutsi, soldier and civilian, all live in equal fear of, and respect for, the law.</s>

en: On law enforcement, Kalyegira is, of course, right to argue that "a state is not just about buildings, street lights or a functional civil service".
lug: Mu kukwasisa amateeka, Kalyegira mutuufu okugamba nti eggwanga teriri ku bizimbe, mataala g'oku nguudo oba obuweereza eri abantu.
mt0: <pad> About law enforcement, Kalyegira is, of course, right to argue that "a state is not just about buildings, street lights or a functional civil service".</s>

en: It is too early to call Rwanda an African success story, as it is inappropriate to call it a normal country.
lug: Ekiseera kikyali okuyita Rwanda olugero lwa Afirika olw'obuwanguzi, ng'era bwe kitali kituufu okuliyita eggwanga erya bulijjo.
mt0: <pad> It's too early to call Rwanda an African success story, as it is inappropriate to call it a normal country.</s>

en: Golooba is Senior Research Fellow, Makerere Institute of Social Research, Makerere University.
lug: Golooba munoonyereza omukugu, Makerere Institute of Social Research, Makerere University.
mt0: <pad> Golooba is Senior Research Fellow, Makerere Institute of Social Research, Makerere University.</s>

en: Mubatsi Asinja HabatiIf says if you plan to seek the services of the Uganda police, prisons service, Mulago Hospital, any court, or UMEME;
lug: Mubatsi Asinja Habatilf agamba nti bw'oba oteekateeka okusaba obweereza bwa poliisi, obw'amakomera, Eddwaliro ly'e Mulago, oba UMEME:
mt0: <pad> Mubatsi Asinja HabatiIf says if you plan to seek the services of the Uganda police, prisons service, Mulago Hospital, any court, or UMEME</s>

en: You must be ready to bribe.
lug: Olina okubeera omwetegefu okugulirira.
mt0: <pad> Osobola okubeera nga okozebwa okubaawo.</s>

en: The East African Bribery Index, a governance tool used to measure bribery levels says that no service is offered in the private and public sectors.
lug: East African Bribery Index, ekikozesebwa kya gavumenti okupima eddaala ly'enguzi kigamba nti tewali buweereza bugabibwa mu bitongole by'obwannannyinga ne mu bya gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> The East African Bribery Index, a governance tool used to measure bribery levels says that no service is offered in the private and public sectors.</s>

en: The Uganda Revenue Authority is slightly different than other national services that were surveyed.
lug: Uganda Revenyue Authority eyawukanamu katono ku bitongole ebirala ebyanoonyerezebwako.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda Revenue Authority is slightly different from other national services that were surveyed.</s>

en: The survey interviewed people in the East African Community member states of Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda and Burundi.
lug: Okunonyereza kwetabibwamu abantu okuva mu nsi za East Afirika okuli Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda ne Burundi.
mt0: <pad> Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda and Burundi.</s>

en: The survey was carried out by Transparency International, an anticorruption watchdog.
lug: Okunoonyereza kwakolebwa Transparency International, ekitongole ekirondoola obuli bw'enguzi.
mt0: <pad> Transparency International, a watchdog for anti-corruption, conducted the survey.</s>

en: URA was found to be the institution with the highest aggregate index of all indicators, which means it performed worst on the bribery index.
lug: URA yasangibwa okuba nga kye kitongole ekisinze okukola obubi nnyo mu bibalo by'enguzi ekitegeeza nti yali ekoze bubi nnyo bwe kituuka ku nguzi.
mt0: <pad> URA yasangibwa nk'ekitongole ekisinga obutundutundu bw'amagezi g'ebipimo byonna, ekitegeeza nti yakikola bulungi mu buguzi bwa magezi.</s>

en: It replaced the Uganda police, which was worst in the survey last year, but moved up to the second worst position this year.
lug: Kyasikira poliisi ya Uganda eyali yasinga okukola obubi mu kunoonyereza kw'omwaka ogwayita n'edda mu kifo ekyokubiri omwaka guno.
mt0: <pad> It replaced the Ugandan police, which was worst in the survey last year, but moved up to the second worst position this year.</s>

en: Regionally, Uganda is the second worst performer on the bribery index after Burundi.
lug: Mu kitundu, Uganda yeeddirira Burundi mu kulya enguzi.
mt0: <pad> Regionally, Uganda is the second worst performer on the bribery index after Burundi.</s>

en: Rwanda is by far the best performer with a corruption prevalence of only 6.6 percent.
lug: Rwanda teriimu nguzi nga eno eri ku bitundu 6.6 ku buli kikumi byokka.
mt0: <pad> Rwanda by far the best performer with a prevalence of only 6.6 percent of corruption.</s>

en: Uganda, Kenya, and Burundi have bribery prevalence of 33 percent and dont expect service at URA, police and UMEME without a bribe.
lug: Uganda, Kenya ne Burundi enguzi eri ku bitundu 33 ku buli kikumi era tusuubira buweereza ku URA, Poliisi ne UMEMR nga towadde nguzi.
mt0: <pad> Nti umanya Uganda, Kenya, and Burundi have bribery prevalence of 33 percent and don't expect service at URA, police and UMEME without a bribe.</s>

en: The report does not provide much information about why there is minimal corruption in Rwanda.
lug: Alipoota tewa bubaka bungi ku lwali enguzi ntono mu Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Raporo ntiivuga byinshi kubera iki Rwanda nta ruswa n'amanyanga y'amagezi.</s>

en: However, it shows that the Rwandan Ombudsman enforces the government's zero tolerance against corruption.
lug: Wabula, kiraga nti omukugu w'e Rwanda afuba okulaba nga tewali wadde enguzi mu gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> Ariko, igaragaza ko Ombudsman w'u Rwanda agendera ku mabwiriza ya leta yo kwirinda icyaha cy'amanyanga.</s>

en: In 2009, the Finance Director at the Presidency of Rwanda was suspended from office.
lug: Mu 2009, akulira ebyensimbi mu woofiisi ya Pulezidenti yagobwa mu woofiisi.
mt0: <pad> In 2009, the Finance Director at the Presidency of Rwanda was suspended from office.</s>

en: He was sentenced to four years in prison following corruption allegations.
lug: Yasibwa emyaka ena mu kkomera olw'ebyo ebyekuusa ku buli bw'enguzi.
mt0: <pad> Okwatiddwa omwaka n'emyaka ina mu jereero nyuma y'ebifanaanyi bya corruption.</s>

en: He was also fined more than one billion Rwandan Francs.
lug: Yatangibwa ensimbi ezisoba mu kawumbi ka ssente za Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Akaba yaciriwe n'amakori arenga miliyoni imwe z'amafaranga y'u Rwanda.</s>

en: A former top civil servant in the Rwandan infrastructure ministry was given a similar fine.
lug: Eyali akulira emirimu mu Minisitule ya Rwanda ey'ebyenkulaakulana naye yaweebwa engassi y'emu.
mt0: <pad> A former top civil servant in the Rwandan ministry of infrastructure was fined a similar fine.</s>

en: Over 20 of the 30 district mayors in Rwanda were removed from office for alleged mismanagement.
lug: Bammeeya ba distulikiti abasukka mu 20 ku 30 mu Rwanda nabo baagobwa mu woofiisi ku bigambiwa nti bazikozesa bubi.
mt0: <pad> About 20 of the 30 mayors in Rwanda were removed from office for alleged mismanagement.</s>

en: In Rwanda, the Ombuds-man's office is responsible for reviewing the revenue declarations submitted by top government officials.
lug: Mu Rwanda , woofiisi y'omukugu evunaanyizibwa ku kukebera omusolo oguweereddwayo abakungu ba gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> Mu Rwanda, Ombuds-man's office is responsible for reviewing the revenue declarations submitted by top government officials.</s>

en: These include the president.
lug: Bano mulimu ne Pulezidenti.
mt0: <pad> These include the president.</s>

en: In comparison to Uganda where relatively low ranking offenders are arraigned before the anti-corruption court and convictions are rare.
lug: Bw'ogeraageranya ne Uganda abantu aba wansi basimbibwa mu kkooti ewozesa abakenuzi era abavunaanibwa batono.
mt0: <pad> In comparison to Uganda where relatively low ranking offenders are arraigned before the anti-corruption court and convictions are rare.</s>

en: In Rwanda, only six percent of respondents said that they had actually paid a bribe.
lug: Mu Rwanda, abantu ebitundu mukaaga ku kikumi bokka ku baabuuzibwa be baagamba nti baali basasudde enguzi.
mt0: <pad> Mu Rwanda, n'imirongo intandatu mu bibazo byawe bavuga ko batanze amabanga.</s>

en: Due to the limited numbers of reported bribery incidents, the index for Rwanda couldn't be formulated by compilers in their report.
lug: Olw'okuba nti abantu batono abawa enguzi, omuwendo gwa Rwanda eyagasse alipoota eno teyagutaddemu.
mt0: <pad> Kubera abantu bake bavuga ko bakora amakosa, Rwanda ntiyashoboye gushyirwa mu kipimo cy'inzira y'ubusaguzi nk'uko byavuzwe n'abakusanya raporo yabo.</s>

en: No other East African country registered high optimism in corruption perceptions compared to Rwanda.
lug: Tewali ggwanga ddala mu East Africa lyalaga bwerufu bwa waggulu ku nguzi bw'oligeraageranya ne Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> No other East African country registered high optimism in corruption perceptions compared to Rwanda.</s>

en: A common new form of corruption used by top government officials in Uganda involves delaying the execution of services to create a crisis.
lug: Engeri empya eriirwamu enguzi ekozesebwa abakungu ba gavumenti mu Uganda erimu okulwawo okutuusa obuweereza okusobola okutondawo obwetaavu obw'amaanyi.
mt0: <pad> A new form of corruption used by top government officials in Uganda involves delaying the execution of services to create a crisis.</s>

en: It happened during the CHOGM in 2007 where colossal amounts of public funds were stolen in hurried procurements.
lug: Kyatuukawo mu CHOGM mu 2007 nga ssente za gavumenti nnyingi zabbibwa mu kugula ebintu mu bwangu.
mt0: <pad> It happened during the CHOGM in 2007 where colossal amounts of public funds were stolen in hurried procurements.</s>

en: The report says that it's clear that the anti-corruption legislations in Uganda have had little impact thus strengthening the cause to review them.
lug: Alipoota egamba nti kyeraga lwatu nti abalwanyisa enguzi mu Uganda tebalina kye bakozeewo n'olw'ekyo ne kyongera okuleetawo obwetaavu obyekenneenya.
mt0: <pad> Uganda n'ebyo byakola mu kulimba abantu.</s>

en: The government's point man in the anti-corruption fight, Minister for Ethics and Integrity, James Nsaba Buturo;
lug: Omukungu wa gavumenti mu kulwanyisa enguzi, minisita w'empisa n'obuntubulamu, James Nsaba Buturo;
mt0: <pad> Uganda's point man in the fight against corruption, Minister for Ethics and Integrity, James Nsaba Buturo</s>

en: Gets defensive when presented with the figures.
lug: Gaana singa obeera ng'osabiddwa enguzi.

en: But Jasper Tumuhimbise, an anticorruption activist, has no doubt about the unease.

mt0: <pad> But Jasper Tumuhimbise, a Ugandan anti-corruption activist, has no doubt about the unease.</s>

en: He says that Uganda might top the region in next year's survey.
lug: Agamba Uganda eyinza okusinga mu kitundu mu kunoonyereza kw'omwaka ogujja.
mt0: <pad> Okwakola Uganda n'okulabirira mu gwanga mu mwaka ogujja.</s>
