mt0: <pad> Tumuhimbise adds that Uganda ranks high on corruption.</s>

en: Apart from Rwanda, all governments in the region appear to lack the will to fight corruption.
lug: Okuggyako Rwanda, gavumenti zonna mu kitundu zirabika nga tezirina busobozi kulwanyisa nguzi.
mt0: <pad> Ariko uretse Rwanda, abayobozi mu karere kose bagaragara ko batagira n'agahunda yo kurwanya ubujura.</s>

en: As a result of this, most citizens do not even bother to report the vice.
lug: Ekiva mu kino, abatuuze abasinga tebafa nayo kuloopa muze guno.
mt0: <pad> As a result of this, most citizens don't even bother to report the vice.</s>

en: At 41 percent, Uganda has the highest number of respondents saying they do not report bribery cases because no action will be taken.
lug: Ku bitundu 41 ku buli kikumi, Uganda y'esinga omuwendo gw'abaabuuzi abagamba nti tebaaloopa misango gya nguzi kubanga tewali kijja kukolebwa.
mt0: <pad> At 41 percent, Uganda has the highest number of respondents saying they do not report bribery cases because no action will be taken.</s>

en: In worst-performing Burundi, however, only 17 percent believe it will rise.
lug: Wabula mu Burundi esingamu enguzi, 17 ku 100 bokka be basuubira nti ejja kweyongera.
mt0: <pad> In Burundi, however, only 17 percent believe it will rise.</s>

en: "What we need is the release of our money," said Odoi.
lug: Twetaaga okuta ssente zaffe, Odoi bwe yagambye.
mt0: <pad> "Ekyo kye tusaanidde ni okukola omulimu gwange," Odoi said.</s>

en: "But we see no headway and we can't open the university to the students", Odoi continued.
lug: Odoi era yayongedeko, tetulabawo kigenda mu maaso era tetusobola kuggulawo ssetendekero eri abayizi.
mt0: <pad> "But we see no progress and we can't open the university to the students", Odoi continued.</s>

en: "The scene at Makerere was calm on Monday but with each passing day the risk of restlessness and frustration grows", Odoi added.
lug: Odoi yayongeddeko, embeera e Makerere yabadde nzikakkamu ku Mmande naye buli lunaku oluyita obunkenke bweyongera.
mt0: <pad> "The scene at Makerere was calm on Monday but with each passing day the risk of restlessness and frustration grows", Odoi added.</s>

en: A clash of faith is emerging at the all African Bishops Conference in Entebbe.
lug: Obukuubagano bw'enzikiriza bubalukawo ku All African Bishops Conference Entebbe.
mt0: <pad> A clash of faith is emerging at the all African Bishops Conference in Entebbe.</s>

en: The six day conference is aimed at fostering unity and breathing new life into the church.
lug: Olusirika olw'ennaku omukaaga lugendereddwamu okunyweza obumu n'okuzza obulamu obupya mu Kkanisa.
mt0: <pad> The six-day conference is aimed at fostering unity and breathing new life into the church.</s>

en: Under the theme, "Securing the future, unlocking our Potential," four hundred Anglicans faith will meet including Rowan Williams.
lug: Wansi w'omulamwa, okutegekera ebiseera by'omu maaso, okusumulula obusobozi bwaffe, Abangirikaani ebikumi bina bajja ku sisinkana nga kw'otadde ne Rowan Williams.
mt0: <pad> 'Okukuuma ebyo mu maaso, okukola ebintu byaffe by'omu maaso', abantu 400 ba Anglicans bagenda kulumba nga Rowan Williams yajja kubamu.</s>

en: He is the Archbishop of Canterbury.
lug: Ye Ssaabasumba w'e Canterbury.
mt0: <pad> Okwakola nti omuntu oyo ni Archbishop of Canterbury.</s>

en: This is a difficult time for the Anglican faith as the divide between Bishops in Africa and outside continues to grow.
lug: Kano akaseera kazibu eri enzikiriza y'Abangirikaani nga okweyawula wakati w'a bepiskoopi mu Afirika n'ebweru kweyongera okukula.
mt0: <pad> Uganda n'ekibiina kya Anglican kigeze mubiseera byagumu kubanga ekitundu wakati w'abasumba mu Africa n'omumaserengeta kibandanya kweyongera.</s>

en: Archbishop Williams has a substantially more favorable stand on homosexuality and gay Bishops serving in the church than African counterparts.
lug: Ssaabasumba Williams ayina w'asibidde awenkizo ku bepiskoopi abalya ebisiyaga okuwereza mu kkanisa okusinga banne abalala mu Afirika.
mt0: <pad> Archbishop Williams alina omutima ogw'okukolagana n'abasajja abagendera mu buzima bw'obufumbo n'abasajja abakorera mu kereke kurusha abebyo ba Africa.</s>

en: The Independent of Aug 27 - Sept 02, 2010 said there is no easy way out of the brutality that confronts the Karimojong civilians today.
lug: Independent eyo gw'omunaana 27 - ogw'omwenda 02,2010,yagamba tewaliiyo ngeri nyangu ya bukaambwe ey'okwenganga aba kalamoja leero.
mt0: <pad> The Independent of Aug 27 - Sept 02, 2010 said there is no easy way out of the brutality that confronts the Karimojong civilians today.</s>

en: As darkness deepens over Karamoja, the National Resistance Movement government continues with its brutal "disarmament programme".
lug: Enzikiza gye yeyongera eri aba karamoja, gavumenti ya National Resistance Movement bweyongera obukambwe bwayo mu ntekateka z'okubaggyako ebyo kulwanyisa.
mt0: <pad> As darkness deepens over Karamoja, the National Resistance Movement government continues with its brutal "disarmament programme".</s>

en: Sadly enough, while this scenario continues, it is business as usual for Ugandans and the rest of the world.
lug: Ekyenaku ekisinga,nga embeera eno ekyagenda mu maaso,Kya bulijjo eri bannayuganda n'ensi endala.
mt0: <pad> N'obutiti, bwe kiba nti ekyo kintu kikikola, bye bye business as usual for Ugandans and the rest of the world.</s>

en: According to available information from Karamoja, the Uganda People's Defence Forces soldiers are conducting a military campaign.
lug: Okusinzira ku mawulire agaliwo okuva e karamoja ,abajaasi ba Uganda People's Defence Force bakola kakuyege w'amagye.
mt0: <pad> According to available information from Karamoja, the Uganda People's Defence Forces soldiers are conducting a military campaign.</s>

en: A Pokot chief elder Mzee Aramutori Lokodo, first brought the plight of the Karimojong to the public in February this year.
lug: Omukadde we Pokot Aramutori Lokodo,yasooka kutereeza mbera ya bakalamoja eri abantu mu gw'okubiri omwaka guno.
mt0: <pad> A Pokot chief elder Mzee Aramutori Lokodo, first brought the plight of the Karimojong to the public in February this year.</s>

en: Then on April 29, 2010, Nicholas Abul, the Kacheri LCIII chairman, was quoted in the media.
lug: Awo ogw'okuna nga 29, 2010,Nicholac Abul,ssentebe wa LCIII owe kacheri,yayogedwako mu mawulire
mt0: <pad> Naye nga 29, April 2010, Nicholas Abul, Omukulu wa LCIII Kacheri, yavugirwa mu binyamakuru.</s>

en: "The army should identify the warriors who are armed and those who are not", Nicholas Abdul said.
lug: Nicholas yagambye nti ,eggye liyina okuzuula abatujju abalina eby'okulwanyisa n'abo abataalina,
mt0: <pad> "Amagye galina okutegeeza abakungu abalina amazzi n'abalina tebaalina," Nicholas Abdul said.</s>

en: During his tour of Karamoja, the Forum for Democratic Change President, Dr Kizza Besigye, saw what was happening there.
lug: Mukulambula kwe e karamoja,pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change,Dr Kizza Besigye yalaba ekyali kigenda mu maaso.
mt0: <pad> During his tour of Karamoja, the President of Forum for Democratic Change Dr Kizza Besigye saw what was happening there.</s>

en: Besigye told journalists at the FDC party headquarters in Najjanankumbi that the abuses take the form of extreme torture.
lug: Besigye yagambye bannamawulire ku kitebe kya FDC e Najjanankumbi nti ebivumo bikola ekika  ky'okutulugunya eky'amaanyi
mt0: <pad> Besigye told journalists at the FDC party headquarters in Najjanankumbi that the abuses take the form of extreme torture.</s>

en: In the New Vision of May 24, 2010, the Uganda Human Rights Commission said Kotido district residents were panic stricken.
lug: Mu New Vision w'ogwokutaano 24,2010,Uganda Human Rights Commision yagamba, abatuuze mu disitulikiti ye Kotido baagwamu entiisa.
mt0: <pad> Mu New Vision ya May 24, 2010, Uganda Human Rights Commission said Kotido district residents were panicked by the spread of a virus.</s>

en: Later, in a meeting with Uganda Human Rights Commission on June 28, the visiting Irish Foreign Affairs minister Michael Martin had some remarks.
lug: Oluvanyuma, mu lukiiko ne Uganda Human Rights Commission nga 28 ogw'omukaaga,minisita w'ensonga z'ebweru eyakyala okuva mu Island Michael Martin aliko bye yayogera.
mt0: <pad> Later, in a meeting with the Uganda Human Rights Commission on June 28, the visiting Irish Foreign Affairs minister Michael Martin had some remarks.</s>

en: "We are concerned about reports on human rights violation against women and children in Karamoja," Martin said.
lug: Martin yagamba, tufaayo ku alipoota ezikolebwa ku kutyoboola eddembe lya bakyala n'abaana e karamoja.
mt0: <pad> "Twabanga n'obutabera ku byo bye byakola mu buganda ku bantu b'abantu mu Karamoja," Martin said.</s>

en: Pokot Member of Parliament, accuses the Elite Special Forces unit of the Uganda People's Defence Forces for the killing "innocent Pokot people".
lug: Omubaka wa paalamenti ow'e Pokot, anenya Elite Special Forces unit eya Uganda People's Defence Forces okutta abantu ba Pokot abataalina musango.
mt0: <pad> Pokot Member of Parliament, accuses the Elite Special Forces unit of the Uganda People's Defence Forces for the killing "innocent Pokot people".</s>

en: Kiyonga also accused the Uganda People's Defence Forces of scalding suspected Karimojong rustlers with hot metals.
lug: Kiyonga naye yanenya Uganda People's Defence Forces okukubisa Abakaramoja abateeberezebwa okuba ababbi b'ente n'ebyuma ebyokya.
mt0: <pad> Kiyonga also accused the Uganda People's Defence Forces of scalding Karimojong rustlers with hot metals.</s>

en: The army spokesman, Leutenant. Colonel. Felix Kulayigye, dismissed the allegations as "unfounded".
lug: Omwogezi w'amagye,Leutenant.Colonel.Felix Kulayigye,yasambazze ebigambibwa nga ebitaliiyo.
mt0: <pad> Leutenant Colonel Felix Kulayigye, a spokesman for the army, dismissed the allegations as "unfounded".</s>

en: On removing people's teeth as a method of torture, Kulayigye said: "Karimojong people have removed their teeth culturally".
lug: Mukuggyamu amannyo nga engeri y'okutulugunya, Kulayigye yagambye, abakaramoja baggyemu amannyo gaabwe lwa buwangwa.
mt0: <pad> About taking people's teeth out as a method of torture, Kulayigye said: "Karimojong people have removed their teeth culturally".</s>

en: Even before the current allegations, another MP wrote to President Museveni and the Commander in Chief about the army's conduct.
lug: Nga nebigambibwa tebinabaawo,MP omulala yawandiikira Pulezidenti Museveni n'omuduumizi w'amagye ku neyisa y'abamagye.
mt0: <pad> Even before the current allegations, another MP wrote to President Museveni and the Commander in Chief about the army's conduct.</s>

en: Jie County Member of Parliament told President Museveni that soldiers killed between twenty eight to forty three civilians in April.
lug: Omubaka wa paalamenti ow'essazza lye Jie yagambye pulezidenti Museveni nti abaserikale batta abantu ba bulijjo abali wakati w'abiri mu munaana n'amakumi ana mu basatu mu gw'okuna.
mt0: <pad> Jie County Member of Parliament told President Museveni that soldiers killed between 28 and 43 civilians in April.</s>

en: The president dismissed the allegations as "baseless" and that the army was "doing a good job in ridding Karamoja of guns.
lug: Pulezidenti yasambazze ebigambibwa nga bwe bitayina nsibuko era nti eggye lyali likola omulimu omulungi mu kuggyako abakaramoja emundu.
mt0: <pad> President Kagame yagambye ebyokulagirira nga "byabulijjo" kandi nti abakungu b'obuyinza "bakola omulimu omulungi mu kuggya Karamoja n'amaato."</s>

en: So such is the tragic situation that has been playing itself in the Karamoja sub-region of North eastern Uganda.
lug: So nno eyo y'embeera ey'entiisa ebadde yeeyolekera mu bitundu by'e Karamoja mu North Eastern Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Uganda ey'okubukiika n'obutambuze bwabantu mu Karamoja mu kitundu ky'omu Uganda ey'amajje.</s>

en: The practice of drawing civilians into the fray of military "operations" is the Uganda People's Defence Force's long standing tradition.
lug: Ekikolwa ky'okukwata abantu ba bulijjo mu bikwekweto by'amagye muze gwa Uganda People's Defence Force.
mt0: <pad> Uganda People's Defence Force's long-standing tradition of dragging civilians into the fray of military "operations" is the Uganda People's Defence Force's long-standing tradition.</s>

en: They know that not all Karimojong carry guns.
lug: Bakimanyi nti si buli Mukaramoja nti ayina emundu.
mt0: <pad> They know that not all Karimojong carry guns.</s>

en: Neither are all Karimojong cattle rustlers, yet they are targeted as if they were.
lug: Si Bakarimajongo bonna nti babbi ba nte, kyokka basongedwamu nga gy'oli nti bali.
mt0: <pad> N'aba Karimojong si bose baagala kubanga bakwatiddwa nga baagala okukola ebyobugagga, naye baakwatiddwa nga baagala okukola ebyobugagga.</s>

en: This is not to suggest that the Karimojong warriors who terrorise their communities and neighbouring districts should not be held accountable.
lug: Kuno si kuteesa nti abakarimojongo abatabaazi abatigomya ebitundu byabwe ne disitulikiti ezibaliranye tebateekeddwa kuvunaanibwa.
mt0: <pad>. Kino tekyagambye nti abagirima ba Karimojong abatambuza abantu mu bitundu byabwe ne mu bitundu ebilala tebagomba kukwatibwa.</s>

en: To the Uganda People's Defence Forces, they are all the same, all "Karimojong are warriors".
lug: Eri Uganda People's Defence Forces, bonna bafaanagana ,Bakarimojongo bonna batabaazi
mt0: <pad> To the Uganda People's Defence Forces, they are all the same, all "Karimojong are warriors".</s>

en: Common sense has to prevail, the Karimojong warriors must be separated from the ordinary civilians.
lug: Amagezi amazaale galina okukola, Bakarimojongo abatabaazi bateekeddwa okwawulibwa ku bantu ba bulijjo.
mt0: <pad> 'Common sense has to prevail, the Karimojong warriors must be separated from the ordinary civilians.</s>

en: Museveni hasn't learnt from the twenty five years of the insurgency in Acholi if he expects to rid Karamoja of guns by force.
lug: Museveni tayigidde ku myaka abiri mu etaano egy'obutabanguko mu Acholi bwaba asuubira okuggyako karamoja emundu n'ekifuba.
mt0: <pad> Musaveni n'amanya nti amaze emyaka 25 mu bugumu bwa Acholi bw'abasirikale bw'ebyobulamu bw'okukola nga ayagala Karamoja avulwe amazzi n'amazima.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Defence Forces continues to target women and children.
lug: Uganda People's Defence Forces eyongera okulubirira abakyala n'abaana.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Defence Forces continues to target women and children.</s>

en: "Collective punishment cannot deliver a peaceful Karamoja." said Olara, a human rights advocate.
lug: Ekibonerezo eky'awamu tekiyinza kuleeta mirembe mu Karamoja, Olara omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'obuntu bwe yagambye.
mt0: <pad> "Okukola ekibiina kyona kiyinza okukola Karamoja ekyenkomerero." Olara, omukugu mu by'abantu yagamba.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Defence Forces continues to target women and children.
lug: Uganda People's Defence Forces eyongera okulubirira abakyala n'abaana.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Defence Forces continues to target women and children.</s>

en: It is rare to read an opinion about politics in Uganda in our media whose premise is our reality.
lug: Tekisangika okusoma endowooza ku by'obufuzi mu Uganda ku mikutu gyaffe egy'empuliziganya  nga ekirowoozo ekyo mbeera zaffe za ddala.
mt0: <pad> It's rare to read an opinion about politics in Uganda in our media whose premise is our reality.</s>

en: Two months ago, two former prime ministers of Buganda Kingdom announced their support for the opposition in the forthcoming elections.
lug: Emyezi ebiiri egyiyise, abaliiko ba katikkiro ba Buganda babiri balangirira obuwagizi bwabwe eri oludda oluvuganya mu kalulu akajja.
mt0: <pad> 2 months ago, two former prime ministers of Buganda Kingdom announced their support for the opposition in the forthcoming elections.</s>

en: Given President Museveni's battles with Mengo over land and federo lately, this was a big public relations coup for our embattled opposition.
lug: Ku lw'entalo za Pulezidenti Museveni ne Mengo ku by'ettaka ne Federo gye buvudeko,luno lwali luwenda lunene eri oludda lwaffe oluvuganya.
mt0: <pad> Given President Museveni's battles with Mengo over land and federo lately, this was a big public relations coup for our embattled opposition.</s>

en: In trying to win over ethnic Baganda, the opposition has done little to root itself in their existential problems.
lug: Mu kugezaako okuwangula Abaganda, oludda oluvuganya lukoze kitono okusimba amakanda ku bizibu byalwo.
mt0: <pad> Mu kugerageza okuba aba Baganda, opposition yateekamu n'obutonde mu bibazo byabwe by'okubeera.</s>

en: However, the calculation is obvious that by winning over powerful Baganda leaders to its side, the opposition hopes to leverage their reputation.
lug: Newankubadde ekibalo kirabirwawo nti okuwangula abakulembeze Abaganda abamaanyi okubeera ku ludda lwabwe ,oludda oluvuganya lusuubira okukozesa ekifaananyi kyabwe.
mt0: <pad> However, the calculation is obvious that by winning over powerful Baganda leaders to its side, the opposition hopes to leverage their reputation.</s>

en: In this lies the fundamental failure of politics in Africa.
lug: Mukino mwe muva ensibuko y'okulemwa eby'obufuzi mu Afirika.
mt0: <pad> Mu kino mwe muli ebyo byakola nti Uganda n'Afrika nti abayinza ba politiki mu Africa nti batabamanyi.</s>

en: During 2006 presidential election, Museveni got one point six million votes and seventy five point four percent in the West.
lug: Mu kalulu k'obwapulezidenti aka 2006,Museveni yafuna obululu akakadde kamu mu emitwalo nkaaga n'ebitundu nsanvu mu bitaano n'obutundutundu buna mu buvanjuba.
mt0: <pad> During the 2006 presidential election, Museveni got one million six thousand votes and seventy five point four percent in the West.</s>

en: Let us assume the same number of registered voters and the same voter turnout as in 2006.
lug: Katusuubire omuwendo ogw'ewandiisa gwegumu n'omuwendo gw'abalonda mu 2006.
mt0: <pad> Twagala nti abantu abawandiikibwa mu by'okulonda balina okuva mu 2006, n'abavugana nga babiribira mu by'okulonda nga babiribira mu 2006.</s>

en: The opposition needs to only force Museveni to a draw in the south east and to forty percent in Buganda.
lug: Oludda oluvuganya lw'etaaga kukaka Museveni basibagane mu South East n'ebitundu ana mu Buganda.
mt0: <pad> Omuzanyo abiri gusa ategeka Museveni kukwata n'amazima mu burengero bwa Buganda na kukwata amakumi mana mu Uganda.</s>

en: For then the combined vote of the opposition would be three point four five million against Museveni's three point three million votes.
lug: N'olwekyo obululu obugatte obw'aboludda oluvuganya bwandibadde obukadde busatu mu emitwalo ana mu etaano okusinga obwa Museveni obukadde busatu mu emitwalo asatu.
mt0: <pad> N'omuntu atamumanya,</s>

en: Buganda is therefore the major battle ground region around which Museveni's presidency will be fought.
lug: Buganda n'olwekyo ky'ekitundu ky'eddwaniro ekkulu obukulembeze bwa Museveni we bujja okulwanyisibwa.
mt0: <pad> Buganda is therefore the major battle ground region around which Museveni's presidency will be fought.</s>

en: If Muliika and Ssemogerere tilt the balance against Museveni in Buganda, it is very likely that we will get another change.
lug: Singa Muliika ne Ssemogerere bakendeeza obululu bwa Museveni mu Buganda, kisuubirwa nti tujja kufuna enkyukakyuka endala.
mt0: <pad> If Muliika and Ssemogerere tilt the balance against Museveni in Buganda, it is very likely that we will get another change.</s>

en: The worrying feature about democratic politics in Africa is how much elites are able to make bargains at the top.
lug: Ekyeraliikiriza ku nkola y'obufuzi eya demokulasiya mu Afirika y'engeri abayivu gye basobola okulamuziganya  waggulu.
mt0: <pad> ekintu eky'okubangamira mu bya politike mu Afirika ni nti abagagga bagenda bakola amazima ku nkomerero.</s>

en: If the opposition can win Buganda simply by entering a deal with a few Baganda elites, it will have little incentive.
lug: Singa oludda oluvuganya lusobola okuwangula Buganda nga bayingira buyingizi mu ddiiru n'abayivu abatono mu buganda, kijja kwetaagisa ebintu bitono.
mt0: <pad> Nga omuntu amanya nti abantu b'obufuzi bategeka Uganda mu ngeri y'okukola eby'amazima n'abagagga b'omu Uganda, bwe bamenya nti Uganda ikoze ekifo kimwe.</s>

en: Politicians in Africa find it more electorally profitable to prioritize the allocation of private goods over pubic goods.
lug: Ab'ebyobufuzi mu Afirika bakisanga nti kifuna nnyo mu byobufuzi okukulembeza ebya maguzi by'obwannannyini ku bya gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> Poliiti mu Africa ebira n'amazima kubanga abakungu bagenda bayamba abantu okwetegekera nti ebyo bya buganda bikubira abantu okwetegekera.</s>

en: To dismantle this elite driven politics is the biggest challenge to democratization in Africa.
lug: Okusanyawo eby'obufuzi bino eby'abasoma, kwe kusoomoza okusinga mu kuteekawo dimokulasiya mu Afirika.
mt0: <pad> To dismantle this elite driven politics is the biggest challenge to democratization in Africa.</s>

en: This is where the opposition has failed to offer an alternative to National Resistance Movement.
lug: Wano oludda oluvuganya we lulemereddwa okuwa ekikira ku National Resistance Movement .
mt0: <pad> Ugandan National Resistance Movement</s>

en: Even in western democracies, the endorsement of influential elites is important, but only for its symbolic value.
lug: Ne demokulasiya mu mawanga g'abazungu, okusimbawo abayivu ab'amaanyi kya mugaso, naye ku lw'emiganyulo gyabwe.
mt0: <pad> Na mu bihugu by'obukiika, ekitiibwa ky'abagagga abakulu kikulu, naye kubanga n'ekiruhuko kyabwe kiba kikulu.</s>

en: It is rare to hear an issue based organizational voice backing a candidate in Uganda.
lug: Tekisangika mu Uganda okuwulira eddoboozi ly'ekibiina nga kisemba ey'esimbyewo.
mt0: <pad> Mu Uganda, ni gakya kuwulira omuyimbaga ovuga ebigambo by'amazima ayamba omubaka.</s>

en: The worrying feature about democratic politics in Africa is how much elites are able to make bargains at the top.
lug: Ekyeraliikiriza ku byobufuzi by'ebibiina ebingi mu Afirika y'engeri abayivu gye basobola okulamuziganyaamu waggulu.
mt0: <pad> ekintu eky'okubangamira mu bya politike mu Afirika ni nti abagagga bagenda bakola amazima ku nkomerero.</s>

en: The crisis of democracy in Africa.
lug: Akatuubagiro ka demokolasiya mu Afirika.
mt0: <pad> The crisis of democracy in Africa</s>

en: Dan Mugarura, the Chairman for Electoral Affairs of the main opposition party, the Forum for Democratic Change, is a very worried man.
lug: Dan Mugarura, ssentebe w'ebyokulonda mu kibiina ky'oludda oluvuganya ekisinga amaanyi ekya Forum for Democratic Change, mweraliikirivu.
mt0: <pad> Dan Mugarura, Chairman for Electoral Affairs of the main opposition party, Forum for Democratic Change, is a very worried man.</s>

en: "If you can shoot your own child and wife, it means you will tear up your neighbour," Mugarura told The Independent.
lug: Mugarura yagambye Independent nti, bwoba osobola okukuba omwana wo ne mukazi wo amasasi, kitegeeza nti osobola okuyuzaayuza muliraanwawo.
mt0: <pad> "Okwagala okuba omwana wo ne mukazi wo, kiba kimanyi nti okoze okumukola omukazi wa nnyumba yawe."</s>

en: He was referring to the violence during the ruling National Resistance Movement party district elections and constituency primaries.
lug: Yali ajuliza ku mivuyo mu kalulu k'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement aka disitulikiti n'akamyufu ka consitituwensi.
mt0: <pad> Okwagala kwali mu byakola ebyo mu byalo by'obufuzi bwa National Resistance Movement n'ebitundu by'amawanga.</s>

en: Mugarura's fears are not unfounded.
lug: Okutya kwa Mugarura tekyina nsibuko.
mt0: <pad> Mugarura's fears are not unfounded.</s>

en: In Kapchorwa's Tingey county, violence erupted between supporters of former minister Stephen Chebrot and the incumbent MP Herbert Sabila.
lug: Mu ssaza lya Kapcholwa erya Tingey, akavuyo kaabalukawo wakati w'abawagizi b'eyaliko Minisita Stephen Chebrot n'abomubaka aliko Herbert Sabila.
mt0: <pad> Mu gguuliro mu kitundu kya Tingey mu Kapchorwa, abantu babiri bakubitwa mu bufero wakati w'abavuga nti Stephen Chebrot n'abadukulu ba MP Herbert Sabila.</s>

en: In West Budama Minister Emmanuel Otala drew a gun at supporters of his opponent.
lug: Mu Budama ey'obuvanjuba, Minisita Emmanuel Otala yatunuza emmundu mu bawagizi b'eyali amuvuganya.
mt0: <pad> Mu Bulaaya Omubaka Emmanuel Otala yatwala omuliro ku bavuganyi ba muganda we.</s>

en: Dr. Gabriel Aridru Ajedra clashed at Awindiri Old Market.
lug: Dokita Gabriel Ajedra yafuna akabenje ku katale Awindiri omukadde.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Gabriel Aridru Ajedra and a former minister of health, Dr. Kenneth Okubo clashed at Awindiri Old Market.</s>

en: In Kaliro, elections were cancelled twice over alleged malpractices.
lug: Mu Kaliro, okulonda kwasazibwamu emirundi ebiri olw'ebigambibwa nti kwalimu emivuyo.
mt0: <pad> Mu Kaliro, eby'amatora byabatwebwa kabiri kubera amazima agagirirwako.</s>

en: In Butaleja the elections were cancelled after a mob attacked the organisers.
lug: Mu Butalejja, okulonda kwasazibwamu oluvannyuma lw'ekibinja ky'abantu okulumba abategesi.
mt0: <pad> Mu Butaleja, eby'okulonda byatanguddwa oluvanyuma lwakuba omukazi n'abaana batya abakola.</s>

en: For many observers, they were indicators of what government could have been dealing with in 2011.
lug: Eri abalabi bangi, waaliwo obubonero obulaga Gavumenti kye yandibadde ekola mu 2011.
mt0: <pad> abakungu benshi, bye byali bimu ku bintu ebiyinza kuba g'obuyinza bwalina okukola mu 2011.</s>

en: According to a 2009 Human Rights Watch International report, security agencies present the single biggest threat.
lug: Okusinziira ku lipoota ya Human Rights Watch International eya 2009 egamba nti ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda bitulugunya abantu.
mt0: <pad> According to a 2009 Human Rights Watch International report, security agencies present the single biggest threat.</s>

en: Ikuya Magode, summed up the current crisis for his party and the country going into the 2011 elections.
lug: Ikuya Magode, yawa ekifaananyi ku mbeera y'akatyabaga mu kibiina kye ng'eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda kwa 2011.
mt0: <pad> Ikuya Magode, summarized the current crisis for his party and the country going into the 2011 elections.</s>

en: The Igbo says, "whenever you see a toad jumping in broad daylight, then know that something is after its life".
lug: Omuyigbo agamba nti, "buli lw'olaba ng'ekikere kibuuka bwe kidduka okuva mu kifo emisana ttuku, ng'omanya nti waliwo abikiyigga,".
mt0: <pad> 'Orubuga ruwagenda mu kiro, n'okumanya nti ekigere kiba kikire.</s>

en: Such was the situation on July 13 when Matia Kasaija, Amama Mbabazi and Crispus Kiyonga, issued statements about the July 11 bomb attacks.
lug: Eyo y'embeera eyaliwo nga 13 Ogwomusanvu, Matia Kasaija, Amama Mbabazi ne Crispus Kiyonga, bwe baayogera ku bulumbaganyi bwa bbomu obwaliwo mu Gwomunaana nga 11.
mt0: <pad> kyo kiba kiki ku wa 13 Mukakaro bwe Matia Kasaija, Amama Mbabazi na Crispus Kiyonga bakola amawulire ku bitero bya bombe bya July 11.</s>

en: Security minister Mbabazi told parliament that when they introduce additional security measures they expect the public to support them.
lug: Minisita w'obutebenkevu Mbabazi yategeeza Paalamenti nti basuubira abantu okubawagira bwe baleetawo engeri z'okukuuma obutebenkevu endala.
mt0: <pad> Mbabazi, minister of security told parliament that when they introduce additional security measures they expect the public to support them.</s>

en: On July 14, the Regulation of Interception Bill was hastily passed inspite of the concerns that it would infringe on citizens' right to privacy.
lug: Ebbago ly'etteeka ku kukebera n'okulondoola abantu lyayisibwa mu Gwomusanvu nga 14, wakati mu bamu okuliwakanya nga bagamba nti lyali lya kuyingirira obulamu bwa Bannayuganda obw'ekyama.
mt0: <pad> Mu July 14, Omukono gw'Okukola Amategeko ku Kuteekamu Amawulire gwatandiikibwa mu ngeri y'okubanga n'amagezi nti gwangakubabira abantu ekiruhuko ky'okuba n'amazima.</s>

en: Finally, in early August, President Museveni issued a policy directive to the Ministry of Finance to remove taxes on security equipment.
lug: Kyaddaaki ng'Ogwomunaana gutandika, Pulezidenti Museveni yayisa ekiragiro ng'alagira minisitule y'ebyensimbi okuggyawo emisolo ku bikozesebwa mu byokwerinda.
mt0: <pad> Finally, in early August, President Museveni issued a policy directive to the Ministry of Finance to remove taxes on security equipment.</s>

en: Nathan Igeme Nabeta, Chairperson Parliamentary CommitteeICT, says it will be some time before the Regulation of Interception Law is operational.
lug: Nathan Igeme Nabeta, ssentebe w'akakiiko ka Paalamenti aka Tekinologiya, agamba nti kijja kubaawo ng'etteeka ly'okulondoola ebyempuliziganya terinnatandika kuteekebwa mu nkola.
mt0: <pad> Nathan Igeme Nabeta, Chairperson ICT Committee, says it will be some time before the Regulation of Interception Law is operational.</s>

en: The government requires funds to equip and run a communication monitoring center and these were not provided for in 2009/2010 budget.
lug: Gavumenti yeetaaga ssente okugulan'okuddukanya ekifo ekinaasinziirwangamu okulondoola ebyempuliziganya ate nga tekyateekebwa mu mbalirira ya2009/2010.
mt0: <pad> Abawabuzi ba gavumenti bagenda kukwata ssente okukola n'okukola enoonya y'amagezi g'okuwuliriza abantu, naye bino tebyatangwa mu budget ya 2009/2010.</s>

en: Nabeta says that right now the law is not useful in the fight against terror.
lug: Nabeta agamba nti mu kiseera kino etteeka terikola ku kulwanyisa obutujju.
mt0: <pad> Nabeta says that at the moment the law is not useful in the fight against terror.</s>

en: In May 2002, the Anti terrorism Act was passed, but it has never been made operational.
lug: Mu Gwomunaana 2002, etteeka erikwata ku butujju lyayisibwa naye libadde teriteekebwanga mu nkola.
mt0: <pad> Mu mwaka wa 2002, ebiragiro by'okulimbana n'iterabwoba byatanguddwa, naye tebyatandiikibwa.</s>

en: Amama Mbabazi insisted in parliament that the Regulation of Interception Law was more specific.
lug: Amama Mbabazi yalemeddeko mu paalamenti nti etteeka ery'okulondoola ebyempuliziganya teryali lyanjulukufu kimala.
mt0: <pad> Amama Mbabazi insisted in parliament that the Regulation of Interception Law was more specific.</s>

en: Resident District Commissioners have embarked on an exercise to push Local Councils back into community policing.
lug: Ababaka ba Pulezidenti batandise kaweefube okulaba ng'abakulembeze b'ebitundu baddayo wansi mu bantu nga babalondoola okulaba ebiba bigenda mu maaso.
mt0: <pad> Resident District Commissioners have embarked on an exercise to push Local Councils back into community policing.</s>

en: Nakawa Resident District Commissioner Fred Bamwine has ordered Local Councils to resume some of their former policing roles.
lug: Omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Nakawa Fred Bamwine alagidde bassentebe b'ebyalo okuddamu egimu ku mulimu gy'okulondoola nga bwe kyali.
mt0: <pad> District Commissioner Fred Bamwine has ordered Local Councils to resume some of their former policing roles.</s>

en: However, until fresh LC elections are held in line with the April 2, 2007 Constitutional Court ruling they cannot dispense justice in minor cases.
lug: Kyokka, okutuusa okulonda kwa bassentebe b'ebyalo lwe kwaliwo nga 2 Ogwomunaana 2007 nga kkooti ya ssemateeka bwe yasalawo, tebasobola kweggyako kutuusa bwenkanya mu misango emitono.
mt0: <pad> Naye, okugeza nti LC ebiri zitegekeddwa mu mwaka wa 2007, nti bamanyi kugaba amazima mu milandu y'obutonde.</s>

en: The 2007 ruling nullified the election of village and parish councils and ordered that new ones be elected under the multi party political order.
lug: Ensala ya 2007 yasazaamu okulondebwa kwa bassentebe b'ebyalo n'ab'emiruka nti abapya baddemu balondebwe wansi w'enkola y'ebibiina ebingi.
mt0: <pad> 2007 ruling nullified the election of village and parish councils and ordered that new ones be elected under the multi party political order.</s>

en: Designed to provide a platform through which political parties and organisations collaborate with the Electoral Commission.
lug: Yakolebwa okuteekawo oluwenda ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ebitongole mwe biyita okukwatagana n'ekakiiko k'ebyokulonda.
mt0: <pad> Designed to provide a platform through which political parties and organisations collaborate with the Electoral Commission.</s>

en: Article 20 provides for a National Consultative Forum to have a chairman nominated from a party with the most representation in parliament.
lug: Ennyingo 20 ewa National Consultative Forum obuyinza okusunsula ssentebe okuva mu ekisinga ababaka mu Paalamenti.
mt0: <pad> Article 20 ekola nti National Consultative Forum ekola omukulu okuva mu kibiina ekisinga obunene mu palamenti.</s>

en: Sam Rwakojo, the Electoral Commission secretary, explained to the twenty eight parties and organisations that attended the launch.
lug: Omuwandiisi w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda Sam Rwakojo, yannyonnyodde ebibiina abiri mu omunaana n'ebibiina ebirala ebyetabye mu kutongoza.
mt0: <pad> Sam Rwakojo, secretary of the Electoral Commission, explained to the eighteen parties and organisations that attended the launch to the twenty-eight parties and organisations.</s>

en: But the absence of even a single National Resistance Movement representative raised eyebrows.
lug: Naye obutakiikirirwa wadde omukiise wa National Resistance Movement bwaleka bangi nga beebuuza ebibuuzo.
mt0: <pad> But the absence of even a single National Resistance Movement representative raised eyebrows.</s>

en: Ssemujja Ibrahim Nganda, spokes person of IPC, which brings together five political parties wondered why the law was amended.
lug: Ssemujja Ibrahim Nganda, omwogezi wa IPC, nga kye kigatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebitaano yeewuunya lwaki etteeka lyakolebwako ennongoosereza.
mt0: <pad> Ssemujja Ibrahim Nganda, a spokesperson of the Interim Party for Change (IPC), which brings together five political parties, wondered why the law was amended.</s>

en: Nganda suspects wicked play.
lug: Nganda ateebereza nti byandibaamu sindikeeti.
mt0: <pad> Nganda suspects wicked play</s>

en: With the chairman's chair empty, the opposition Forum for Democratic Change party's Amanya Mushega was nominated as the vice chairperson.
lug: Ng'entebe ya ssentebe nkalu, ekibiina ekiri ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti ekya Forum for Democratic Change kyasunsula Amanya Mushega ku ky'omumyuka wa ssentebe.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan opposition party Forum for Democratic Change's Amanya Mushega was nominated as the vice chairperson.</s>

en: Nganda said that at times people put much importance to the establishment of an organisation.
lug: Nganda yagamba nti ebiseera ebimu abantu bassa nnyo essira ku kutondawo ekibiina.

en: Asuman Basalirwa, said he does not think the political parties and organisations will benefit from the forum.

mt0: <pad> Asuman Basalirwa, said he does not think the political parties and organisations will benefit from the forum.</s>

en: Article 67 of the 1995 Uganda constitution states;

en: "No election candidate shall be denied reasonable access and use of State owned communication media".

en: Basalirwa said, for example, if it had been established earlier, the Forum would have dealt with the reconstitution of the Electoral Commission.
lug: Okugeza Basalirwa yagambye nti kyali kyateekebwawo mu bwango, omukago gwandiyambyeko mu kuzza obuggya akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.
mt0: <pad> Basalirwa said, for example, if it had been established earlier, the Forum would have dealt with the reconstitution of the Electoral Commission.</s>

en: The independence of the Electoral Commission is doubted by the opposition parties.
lug: Ab'ebibiina ebiri ludda oluvuganya gavumenti babuusabuusa obwetengereze bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan opposition parties doubt the impartiality of the Electoral Commission.</s>

en: The forum was a prerequisite under the Public Procurement Oversight Authority that was passed by parliament on March 20, 2002.
lug: Omukago gwali gwasabibwa mu kitongole ekikola ku kugula n'okutunda ebintu bya gavumenti ekyayisibwa Paalamenti mu Gwokusatu nga 20, 2002.
mt0: <pad> Forum y'amagezi yategekebwa mu bufuzi bwa Uganda nga bwe bwatandiika mu mwaka wa 2002, n'abakulembeze ba palamenti.</s>

en: Basalirwa predicts that the Forum will be of no help between now and February 2011, when the general elections will be held.
lug: Basalirwa ateebereza nti omukago tegujja kuba na mugaso okuva kati okutuuka mu Gwokubiri 2011, akalulu ka bonna gye kanaabeererayo.
mt0: <pad> Basalirwa predicts that the Forum will be of no help between now and February 2011, when the general elections will be held.</s>

en: It is six months to the next elections and it is obvious the forum has many issues to address.
lug: Wasigadde emyezi mukaaga okutuuka ku kulonda era kirabikirawo nti omukago gulina ensonga nnyingi ez'okukolako.
mt0: <pad> 6 months to the next elections and it is obvious the forum has many issues to address.</s>

en: President Museveni, who is the chairman of the NRM and appoints the Electoral Commission, has said he will not change its composition.
lug: Pulezidenti Museveni, nga ye ssentebe wa NRM era alonda akakiiko k'ebyokulonda yagamba nti tasobola kukakyusaamu.
mt0: <pad> President Museveni, omuntu omukulembeze w'ekibiina kya NRM n'akola ku Electoral Commission, yagamba nti teyahindura abantu baayo.</s>

en: The launch was at Hotel Africana Kampala on August.
lug: Okutongoza kwali ku Hotel Africana Kampala mu Gwomunaana.
mt0: <pad> The launch was at Hotel Africana Kampala on August.</s>

en: Rwakoojo conducted over seventeen meetings together with all Electoral Commission commissioners.
lug: Rwakoojo ng'ali wamu ne bakaminsona b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda bonna yateekateeka enkungaana ezisukka ekkumi n'omusanvu.
mt0: <pad> Rwakoojo took part in over seventeen meetings with all Electoral Commission commissioners.</s>

en: The EC chairman, Engineer. Badru Kiggundu and Rwakoojo, said they would ensure that political parties comply with the code of conduct.
lug: Ssentebe w'akakiiko kano, yinginiya Badru Kiggundu ne Rwakoojo, baagamba nti baakulaba ng'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bikuuma empisa.
mt0: <pad> The EC chairman, Engineer. Badru Kiggundu and Rwakoojo, said they would ensure that political parties comply with the code of conduct.</s>

en: Nganda told the Independent that the leadership does not matter but what matters is how decisions are arrived at.
lug: Nganda yategeeza Independent nti obukulembeze si kye kikulu, wabula ekikulu y'engeri okusalawo gye kutuukibwako.
mt0: <pad> Nganda told the Independent that the leadership does not matter but what matters is how decisions are arrived at.</s>

en: Basalirwa agrees that if the leader of the forum has good will, then the forum will succeed in addressing the issues.
lug: Basalirwa akkirirza nti ssinga ssentebe w'omukago anaaba n'omutima ogugwagaliza, omukago guno gwa kuggusa ensonga zonna.
mt0: <pad> Basalirwa agrees that if the leader of the forum has good will, then the forum will succeed in addressing the issues.</s>

en: National Resistance Movement absence threatens party forum launch.
lug: Obutabaawo bwa National Resistance Movement kissa okutongoza omukago mu kattu.
mt0: <pad> National Resistance Movement absence threatens party forum launch</s>

en: Last week the police blocked a meeting by the Democratic Party faction led by Samuel Lubega at Nsambya Youth Sharing Hall in Kampala.
lug: Wiiki ewedde poliisi yalemesa olukungaana lw'ekiwayi kya Democratic Party ekikulirwa Samuel Lubega ku Nsambya Youth Sharing Hall mu Kampala.
mt0: <pad> Last week, police blocked a meeting by the Democratic Party faction led by Samuel Lubega at Nsambya Youth Sharing Hall in Kampala.</s>

en: The meeting was to discuss terms under which they would join the Interparty Cooperation, a loose alliance of five political parties.
lug: Olukungaana lwali lwa kuteesa ku ngeri gye bandiyiseemu okwegatta ku mukago gw'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebitaano.
mt0: <pad> Awo mulimu nti baagala kumenya engeri gye bazaanidde okukwatagana mu Interparty Cooperation, ekitundu ekifo ky'ebigere bya politiki bitandatu.</s>

en: The faction relocated the meeting to Kabusu village and resolved to join the Inter Party Corporation.
lug: Ekiwayi kino kyakyusa olukiiko ne kiruzza ku kyalo Kasubi ne basalawo okwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.
mt0: <pad> The faction relocated the meeting to Kabusu village and decided to join the Inter Party Corporation.</s>

en: The officially recognised DP said that they had summoned the five leaders of the Lubega faction to the party's disciplinary committee.
lug: DP emanyikiddwa mu butongole yagamba nti baali baayita abakulembeze b'ekiwayi kya Lubega mu kakiiko k'ekibiina akakwasisa empisa.
mt0: <pad> The officially recognised DP said that they had summoned the five leaders of the Lubega faction to the party's disciplinary committee.</s>

en: Simon Peter Ochieng, said they had not received any letter calling them to appear before the disciplinary committee.
lug: Simon Peter Ochieng, yagamba nti baali tebannafuna bbaluwa yonna ebayita okulabikako eri akakiiko akakwasisa empisa.
mt0: <pad> Simon Peter Ochieng, yagambye nti tebaabatumire ku mukono gwa komite ya nkola.</s>

en: He said Mao's group only summoned them through a press conference for publicity purposes.
lug: Yagamba nti ekibinja kya Mao kyabayita buyisi mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire n'ekigendererwa ky'okumanyibwa.
mt0: <pad> Okwakola yagambye nti Mao's group yabatumire mu kibuga ky'amawulire ku ngeri y'okumanyisa.</s>

en: Ochieng said that Mao's group loves media attention.
lug: Ochieng yagamba nti ekibinja kya Mao kyagala nnyo amawulire.
mt0: <pad> Ochieng said that Mao's group loves media attention.</s>

en: He said they pulled the same action on August 18 when they went to meet the Inter Party Corporation leaders and called journalists to escort them.
lug: Yagamba nti baakola ekintu kye kimu nga 18 Ogwomunaana bwe baagenda okusisinka omukago ogutaba ebibiina bye byobufuzi ne bayita bannamwawulire okubawerekererako.
mt0: <pad> Okwakola yagambye nti baakola ekyo mu gw'okusatu nga baagendaga kukwata abakulembeze b'Inter Party Corporation, era nga baali bataddewo abajje kubakwatira.</s>

en: Salaam Musumba, approves that Mao's group went to meet the Inter Party Corporation for publicity purposes.
lug: Salaam Musumba, akakasa nti ekiwayi kya Mao kyagenda okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ekigendererwa ky'okumanyika.
mt0: <pad> Salaam Musumba, approval that Mao's group went to meet the Inter Party Corporation for publicity purposes.</s>

en: Musumba described Mao's decision to meet Inter Party Corporation leaders as a childish check to attract publicity.
lug: Musumba yannyonnyola okusalowo kwa Mao okusisinkana abakulembeze b'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ng'ekyekito eky'okwagala okwogerwako.
mt0: <pad> Musumba described Mao's decision to meet Inter Party Corporation leaders as a childish check to attract publicity.</s>

en: The Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly minimizing the Inter Party Corporation.
lug: Engeri ekiwayi kya Mao okwekyusa mbagirawo kyali kyewuunyisa olw'okuba nti kyali kyagala nnyo amawulire g'omukago ogutaba ebibiina bye byobufuzi.
mt0: <pad> Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly minimizing the Inter Party Corporation.</s>

en: Musumba said they were not interested in spoiling in childish politics.
lug: Musumba yagamba nti tebaali beetegefu kumala biseera mu byabufuzi bya kito.
mt0: <pad> Musumba said they were not interested in spoiling in childish politics.</s>

en: She said the Inter Party Corporation had written to the Mao group to join Inter Party Corporation but they refused.
lug: Yagamba nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwali gwawandiikira ekiwayi kya Mao okugwegattako naye nga kyagaana.
mt0: <pad> She said Inter Party Corporation had written to the Mao group to join Inter Party Corporation but they refused.</s>

en: They later decided to examine the legal and political implications of accepting one faction of Democratic Party when the other is out.
lug: Oluvannyuma baatandika okwetegereza enkola ey'amateeka n'enkola z'ebyobufuzi ezandivudde mu kukkiriza ekiwayi kya Democratic Party ekimu ng'ekirala tebakolagana nakyo.
mt0: <pad> Awo baakola ekigendererwa ky'okutegeeza ebyo kubirabwa mu mateeka n'amazima by'okukwata ekimu ku bitundu by'ekibiina kya Democratic Party nga ekirala kiba kibuze.</s>

en: The Inter Party Corporation then subjected the issue to a legal and political survey.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ensonga gwagizza ku kunoonyereza kw'amateeka n'ebyobufuzi.
mt0: <pad> The Inter Party Corporation then subjected the issue to a legal and political survey.</s>

en: Musumba said, it was then Mao and his group came accompanied by journalists to meet the Inter Party Corporation.
lug: Musumba yagamba nti mu kiseera ekyo Mao n'ekibinja bajja nga bawerekeddwako bannawawulire okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.
mt0: <pad> Musumba said, it was then Mao and his group came accompanied by journalists to meet the Inter Party Corporation.</s>

en: She said it appears Mao's Democratic Party is neither interested in joining the Inter Party Corporation nor cooperating with them on anything.
lug: Yagamba nti kirabika nga ekiri nti Democratic Party ya Mao teyagala kwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi oba nga tekolagana nakyo mu ngeri yonna.
mt0: <pad> Okwakola nti Mao's Democratic Party ntagiraba nga igendererwa mu kujoyina Inter Party Corporation, nokogeragana nabo ku bintu byonna.</s>

en: Mao had said after the Inter Party Corporation meeting that Democratic Party was up to exploring the form.
lug: Oluvannyuma lw'olusisinkana olwo n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyofuzi Mao yagamba nti Democratic Party yali egezaako okunoonya engeri z'okukolamu emirimu.
mt0: <pad> Mao yagamba nyuma y'ekibiina kyona kyona ky'amagwanga nti Democratic Party yali itegekanya kugerageza uburyo bw'okukola.</s>

en: The Mao group wants to field their own presidential candidate but can cooperate with the Inter Party Corporation on other areas.
lug: Ekibinja kya Mao kyagala kusimbawo omuntu waakyo avuganye ku Bwapulezidenti olwo kikwatagane n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi mu bifo ebirala.
mt0: <pad> Mao group wants to field their own presidential candidate but can cooperate with the Inter Party Corporation on other areas.</s>

en: Mao also said he supports the Inter Party Corporation position to have the current Electoral Commission changed.
lug: Mao era yagamba nti akkaanya n'eky'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okukyusa engeri ebyobufuzi gye bikolebwamu.
mt0: <pad> Mao also said he supports the Inter Party Corporation's position to have the current Electoral Commission changed.</s>

en: Musumba said this was Mao's trick to hinder the IPC from considering the option of accepting the other Democratic Party faction.
lug: Musumba yagamba nti kano kaali kakodyo ka kiwayi kya Mao okulaba ng'omukago gwa IPC tegulowooza ku kya kukkirirza kwegattibwako kiwayi kya Democratic Party ekirala.
mt0: <pad> Musumba yagambye nti ekyo kyali kikinyi kya Mao okubuza IPC kutegeeza n'okukolako ekitundu kyona mu kibiina kya Democratic Party.</s>

en: However Mathias Nsubuga, the secretary general of the Mao Democratic Party, said it's the Inter Party Corporation who invited them for a meeting.
lug: Wabula Mathias Nsubuga, ssaabawandisi wa Democratic Party, yagambye nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi nti gwayitibwa mu lukungaana.
mt0: <pad> However Mathias Nsubuga, the secretary general of the Mao Democratic Party, said it was the Inter Party Corporation who invited them for a meeting.</s>

en: Musumba removed Nsubuga's claim.
lug: Musumba yamazeewo Nsubuga by'ayogera.
mt0: <pad> Musumba took Nsubuga's claim.</s>

en: She said Mao's group came for other reasons other than the invitation because they had long ignored it.
lug: Yagamba nti ekiwayi kya Mao kyajja lwa nsonga ndala ezitali ku kuyitibwa kubanga baali baludde nga bagyewala.
mt0: <pad> Okwa bwe, Mao's group yaje ku mpamvu endala nga omukutu wabatumire, kubanga baagala okutegeeza nti baali batayita mu buweereza bwabwe.</s>

en: Some members of the Inter Party Corporation say they have put on hold the decision to accept one Democratic Party group.
lug: Bammemba abamu ab'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bagamba nti baayimirizza eky'okusalawo ku kukkiriza okuyingiza ekimu ki biwayi bya Democratic Party.
mt0: <pad> Abakungu b'Inter Party Corporation bagamba nti baayimirira mu kusalawo okukwata ekitundu kimwe ky'ekibiina kya Democratic Party.</s>

en: Dr Frank Nabwiso believes the two groups can reconcile.
lug: Dr Frank Nabwiso alina okukkiriza nti ebiwayi ebibiri bisobola okutabagana.
mt0: <pad> Dr Frank Nabwiso believes the two groups can reconcile.</s>

en: But the Lubega faction is looking at admission into the Inter Party Corporation rather than reconcile with the Mao group.
lug: Naye ekiwayi kya Lubega kiruubirira bukulembeze bw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi so si kutabagana n'ekibinja kya Mao.
mt0: <pad> But the Lubega faction is looking at admission into the Inter Party Corporation rather than reconciling with the Mao group.</s>

en: In an interview with Lubega before Mbale conference early this year, his position on joining Inter Party Corporation was the same as Mao's.
lug: Mu mboozi ey'akafubo ne Lubega eyaliwo nga ttabamiruka w'e Mbale tannabaawo, endowooza ye ku kwegatta ku IPC yali y'emu ng'eya Mao.
mt0: <pad> Mu kiganiro n'akatabo ka Lubega nga atandikira mu Mbale mu mwaka guno, omutima we ku kwinjira mu Inter Party Corporation wari ugw'a Mao.</s>

en: The Democratic Party would not join the Inter party Cooperation because the party always lost their members in such unions.
lug: Democratic party si yakwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina kubanga ekibiina kizze kiviibwako bammemba bakyo mu mikago ng'egyo.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Party would not join the Inter party Cooperation because the party always lost their members in such unions.</s>

en: Observers say he was one sided to take his Democratic Party camp into the 2011 elections without the backing of other opposition parties.
lug: Abatunuulizi b'ensonga bagamba nti yalina kyekubiira okutwala enkambi ye eya Democratic Party mu kulonda kwa 2011 nga tasembeddwa bibiina by'oludda oluvuganya ebirala.
mt0: <pad> Obusimu bwabwe bwakola nti yatwala ekibiina kye mu maaso mu bya 2011 nga tebalina n'okukwata kwa bavuganya abandi.</s>

en: They were also facing a lot of pressure from the Mao group.
lug: Era baali basanga okunyigirizibwa kungi nnyo okuva mu kibinja kya Mao.
mt0: <pad> They were also facing a lot of pressure from the Mao group.</s>

en: The Mao group ignored reconciliation with the Lubega group.
lug: Ekibinja kya Mao kyesamba okutabagana n'ekibinja kya Lubega.
mt0: <pad> Mao group ignored reconciliation with the Lubega group.</s>

en: Nsubuga said that court declared Mao the lawful leader of the Democratic Party.
lug: Nsubuga yagambye nti kkooti yalangiridde Mao ng'omukulembeze wa Dmocratic Party mu mateeka.
mt0: <pad> Nsubuga yagambye nti kkooti yategeeza Mao nga omukulembeze wa buli kitundu w'ekibuga.</s>

en: He says the Lubega group must succumb to Mao, who was elected in the Mbale Delegates Conference.
lug: Agamba nti ekibinja kya Lubega kirina okugondera Mao eyalondeddwa mu lukiiko ttabamiruka e Mbale .
mt0: <pad> He says the Lubega group must succumb to Mao, who was elected in the Mbale Delegates Conference.</s>

en: Both Democratic Party groups have been holding similar activities since the Mbale conference.
lug: Ebibinja bya Democratic Party byombi bibadde bikola emirimu gye gimu okuva lwe byava mu lukiiko e Mbale.
mt0: <pad> Both Democratic Party groups have been holding similar activities since the Mbale conference.</s>

en: Mukasa Mbidde told the Independent that they asked the police to block the meeting of the Lubega's group in Nsambya Sharing Hall.
lug: Mukasa Mbidde yagambye Independent nti baasaba poliisi okulemesa olukungaana lw'ekibinja kya Lubega ku Nsambya Sharing Hall.
mt0: <pad> Mukasa Mbidde told the Independent that they asked the police to block the meeting of the Lubega's group in Nsambya Sharing Hall.</s>

en: According to the Independent issue on August 27- September 02, 2010, Mubatsi reported, Mao seeks to work with the Inter Party Cooperation.
lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 27 Ogwomunaana okutuka Ogwomwenda nga 02, 2010, Mubatsi yagamba nti Mao anoonya kukolagana n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> According to the Independent issue on August 27- September 02, 2010, Mubatsi reported, Mao seeks to work with the Inter Party Cooperation.</s>

en: The Inter Party Cooperation brings together five opposition parties.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina gugatta wamu ebibiina ebitaano ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya.
mt0: <pad> Inter Party Cooperation brings together five opposition parties.</s>

en: Four of the five parties nominated their candidates except Uganda People's Congress.
lug: Ebibiina bina ku bitaano byasunsula abeesimbyewo ng'oggyeko Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> Four of the five parties nominated their candidates except Uganda People's Congress.</s>

en: The Ugandan People's Congress, the third largest opposition party in parliament, did not attend the nominations at Kololo Airstrip.
lug: Uganda People's Congress, ekibiina ekyokusatu mu bunene mu paalamenti, tekyetaba mu kusunsula ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi e Kololo.
mt0: <pad> The Ugandan People's Congress, the third biggest opposition party in parliament, did not attend the nominations at Kololo Airstrip.</s>

en: The nomination was extended to August 23 to give Uganda People's Congress time to nominate its candidate, but the deadline elapsed.
lug: Okusunsula kwayongezebwayo okutuka nga 23 Ogwomunaana okuwa Uganda People's Congress obudde okusunsula abantu baayo naye ssalessale yayitako.
mt0: <pad> Uganda People's Congress yateekamu omulundi ogw'okunonyereza ku wa 23 Ogw'omwezi guno, okujjamu n'umwanya w'okunonyereza omukazi, naye ekifo kimaze.</s>

en: This time Otunnu pointed out unresolved issues under the Inter Party Cooperation arrangement which must be sorted out first.
lug: Omulundi guno Otunnu yanokoddeyo ensonga ezitannakolwako wansi w'enteekateeka z'omukago ogutaba ebibiina ezirina okusooka okukolwako.
mt0: <pad> Otunnu yagambye nti ebimu ku bibazo bya Inter Party Cooperation byandibadde tebyava mu maaso, ebyetaaga okukolako ekyokulabirako.</s>

en: It's not the pending arrest of Otunnu that had prevented the Uganda People's Congress from nominating its candidate to Inter Party Cooperation.
lug: Okusibwa kwa Otunnu si kwe kwagana Uganda People's Congress okusunsula abantu baayo okwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> Nti nti Omutujju Otunnu yakwatiddwa mu bufere bwabwe y'okubanga Uganda People's Congress itakola ekifo ky'okunonyereza omusango gwayo ku Inter Party Cooperation.</s>

en: It provided practical coverage for growing conflicts within the Inter Party Congress.
lug: Kyateekawo engeri y'okugonjoolamu obukuubagano mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> It provided practical coverage for growing conflicts within the Inter Party Congress.</s>

en: The Inter Party Congress will nominate the joint candidate on August 31.
lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina gujja kusunsula abeesimbyewo okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo nga 31 Ogwomunaana.
mt0: <pad> The Inter Party Congress will nominate the joint candidate on August 31.</s>

en: There is a strong feeling that the Inter Party Cooperation is being run mainly by the Federation of Democratic Change.
lug: Waliwo okukkiriza kwa maanyi nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina gusinga kuddukanyizibwa Federation of Democratic Change.
mt0: <pad> There is a strong feeling that the Inter Party Cooperation is being run mainly by the Federation of Democratic Change.</s>

en: The UPC says the Federation of Democratic Change is running Inter Party Cooperation activities without involving the other participating parties.
lug: UPC egamba nti Federation of Democratic Change eddukanya emirimu gy'omukago ogutaba ebibiina awatali kwetabyamu bibiina birala ebirimu.
mt0: <pad> The UPC says the Federation of Democratic Change is running Inter Party Cooperation activities without involving the other participating parties.</s>

en: Sources within the Ugandan People's Congress say that the party wants Otunnu to be the Inter Party Congress joint candidate.
lug: Ensonda okuva mu Ugandan People's Congress zigamba nti ekibiina kyagala Otunnu avuganye ku bwa mmemba bw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> Sources within the Ugandan People's Congress say that the party wants Otunnu to be the Inter Party Congress joint candidate.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress supported the Democratic Party's Paul Ssemogerere in the first interparty union in 1996 and Kizza Besigye in 2001.
lug: Uganda People's Congress yawagira Paul Ssemwogerere owa Democratic Party mu kwegatta kw'ebibiina okwasooka mu 1996 ne Kizza Besigye mu 2001.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress supported the Democratic Party's Paul Ssemogerere in the first interparty union in 1996 and Kizza Besigye in 2001</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress will not settle for anything short of Otunnu being the automatic Inter Party Cooperation flag bearer.
lug: Uganda People's Congress tejja kuwummula okutuusa nga Otunnu alondeddwa okukulembera omukago ogutaba ebibiina
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress will not settle for anything short of Otunnu being the automatic Inter Party Cooperation flag bearer.</s>

en: They would rather quit the Inter Party Cooperation arrangement and contest in 2011 as a party rather than an alliance.
lug: Waakiri bava muntekateka z'omukago ogutaba ebibiina ne beesimbawo mu 2011 ng'ekibiina okusinga okwegatta awamu.
mt0: <pad> They would rather quit the Inter Party Cooperation arrangement and contest in 2011 as a party rather than an alliance.</s>

en: They say Otunnu's cabinet is completely against their leader.
lug: Bagamba nti kabinenti ya Otunnu ewakanyiza ddala omukulembeze waabwe.
mt0: <pad> They say Otunnu's cabinet is completely against their leader.</s>

en: It was set up by the Uganda People's Congress.
lug: Kyatandikibwawo Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> It was set up by the Uganda People's Congress.</s>

en: The rejection of the Electoral Commission was advanced by Olara Otunu.
lug: Okugaana kw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kwayogerwako Olara Otunu.
mt0: <pad> Olara Otunu yagambye nti ekibuga kya Electoral Commission kiba kikyali.</s>

en: The Forum for Democratic Change has since diverted it into pretending it was their idea.
lug: Forum for Democratic Change okuva olwo yakyusa nga yeeyisaako nti kyali kirowozo kyayo.
mt0: <pad> Forum for Democratic Change yatandika okumuyita mu kubanga nga kiba kyabwe.</s>

en: Why did they take part in the elections even though they knew that the Electoral Commission was for the National Resistance Movement?
lug: Lwaki beetaba mu kulonda ng'ate baali bakimanyi nti akakiiko k'ebyokulonda ka National Resistance Movement?
mt0: <pad> kye kiki ekyatuma baakola mu matora nga bazi nti ekibuga kya Electoral Commission kye kya National Resistance Movement?</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress participated in the 2006 elections as well, which were presided over by the same Electoral Commission.
lug: Uganda People's Congress yeetaba ne mu kulonda okwa 2006, okwategekebwa akakiiko k'ebyokulonda ke kamu.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress also participated in the 2006 elections, which were presided over by the same Electoral Commission.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress is questioning why the Forum for Democratic Change did not reject the Electoral Commission in 2006.
lug: Uganda People's Congress yeebuuza lwaki Forum for Democratic Change teyagaana kakiiko k'ebyokulonda mu 2006.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress is questioning why the Forum for Democratic Change did not reject the Electoral Commission in 2006.</s>

en: It's clear that the Inter Party Congress partnership was hurriedly entered without much thought into the details of how it would work.
lug: Kyeraga lwatu nti okukolera awamu mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina kwapapirwa okuyingirwamu ewatali kutunuulira ngeri gye guyinza kukolamu.
mt0: <pad> It's clear that the Inter Party Congress partnership was hurriedly entered without much thought into the details of how it would work.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress claims that it never supported the idea of a joint candidate at this stage of the elections.
lug: Uganda People's Congress yeemulugunya nti teyawagira kirowoozo kya kuleeta muntu omu bwe kyatuka ku kulonda.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress says it never backed the idea of a joint candidate at this stage of the elections.</s>

en: Our initial agreement in the Inter Party Congress was that we jointly fight the political harassment and the election malpractices.
lug: Okukkiriziganya kwafe okwasooka mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina kwali kulwanyisiganyiza wamu okutulugunyizibwa mu byobufuzi n'emize emibi egirabikira mu bululu.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan Inter Party Congress was that we fight together the political harassment and election malpractices.</s>

en: Without a fifty percent win Museveni would be forced to go for a re-run.
lug: Awatali kuwangula na bitundu ataano ku kikumi Museveni yandikakiddwa okuddamu okuvuganya.
mt0: <pad> Without a fifty percent win Museveni would be forced to go for a re-run.</s>

en: The Uganda People's Congress says the Forum for Democratic Change has changed from that position.
lug: Uganda People's Congress egamba nti Forum for Democratic Change ekyuse okuva mu kifo ekyo.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda People's Congress says the Forum for Democratic Change has changed from that position.</s>

en: This hot fallout was mainly between the Forum for Democratic Change and the Uganda People's Congress.
lug: Okuyomba kuno okusinga kwali wakati wa Forum for Democratic Change ne Uganda People's Congress.
mt0: <pad> Uganda People's Congress and Forum for Democratic Change</s>

en: When the parties came out of the meeting Otunnu made an unreal statement that the Uganda People's Congress has never said.
lug: Ebibiina bwe byafuluma mu lukiiko, Otunnu yakola sitatimenti etaali ntuufu ku Uganda People's Congress gyetaayogera.
mt0: <pad> When the parties came out of the meeting Otunnu made an unreal statement that the Uganda People's Congress has never said.</s>

en: He did not clarify whether he would submit himself for Inter Party Cooperation nominations.
lug: Teyalambulula oba ng'aneetaba mu kusunsula kw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> Ategeze nti yali agamba nti ajja kwerekerereza mu by'okulonda Inter Party Cooperation.</s>

en: The confusion made it worse when Otunnu said he could not readily say he would be nominated by August 31.
lug: Okutabulwa kweyongera Otunnu bwe yagamba nti teyali mwetegefu kusunsulwa nga 31 Ogwomunaana.
mt0: <pad> Okuzuula kwayongera bwe Otunnu yagamba nti teyamanya nnyo oba ajja kwewandiikibwa nga August 31,</s>

en: Otunnu told the press that the Uganda People's Congress will decide accordingly after they have reviewed the Inter Party Congress decisions.
lug: Otunnu yagamba bannamawulire nti Uganda People's Congress ejja kusalawo oluvannyuma lw'okulaba okusalawo kw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> Otunnu told the press that the Uganda People's Congress will decide accordingly after they have reviewed the Inter Party Congress decisions.</s>

en: Lukyamuzi, Besigye and Kyanjo asked Otunnu if the Uganda People's Congress was withdrawing from the Inter Party Congress.
lug: Lukyamuzi, Besigye ne Kyanjo baabuuza Otunnu oba nga Uganda People's Congress yali eva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina.
mt0: <pad> Lukyamuzi, Besigye and Kyanjo asked Otunnu if the Uganda People's Congress was withdrawing from the Inter Party Congress.</s>

en: They were welcomed with songs of Uganda Patriotic Movement as they took up their seats.
lug: Baayanirizibwa n'ennyimba za Uganda Patriotic Movement nga bwe batuula mu bifo byabwe.
mt0: <pad> Uganda Patriotic Movement yabatambuza mu ndirimbo zabwe nga bamalayika bagenda ku ntebe.</s>

en: It was the birth of the Uganda Patriotic Movement.
lug: Eyo ye yali entadikwa ya Uganda Patriotic Movement
mt0: <pad> It was the birth of the Uganda Patriotic Movement.</s>

en: Yoweri Museveni was the temporary chairman and vice chairman of the Military Commission.
lug: Yoweri Museveni ye yali ssentebe ow'ekiseera era omumyuka wa ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amaggye.
mt0: <pad> Yoweri Museveni was the temporary chairman and vice-chairman of the Military Commission.</s>

en: These people, together with many others, found themselves unable to join either the Uganda People's Congress or the Democratic Party.
lug: Abantu bano n'abalala bangi beesanga nga tebasobola kwegatta ku Uganda People's Congress oba ku Democratic Party.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bano, wamu na bamalala bangi, basanze bataba bamanyi kukwatagana mu buganda bwa Uganda People's Congress oba mu kibiina kya Democratic Party.</s>

en: Museveni warned that the Ugandan people are fed up with dictatorship and are now concerned about a disciplined democracy.
lug: Museveni yalabula nti Bannayuganda bakooye obwannakyemalira era kati bafa nnyo ku demokolasiya owempisa.
mt0: <pad> Museveni warned that the people of Uganda are fed up with dictatorship and are now worried about a disciplined democracy.</s>

en: The Uganda Patriotic Movement includes groups like the Front for National Salvation which fought Amin for eight years.
lug: Uganda Patriotic Movement erimu ebibinja nga Front for National Salvation ekyalwanyisa Amin okumala emyaka munaana.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda Patriotic Movement includes groups like the Front for National Salvation which fought Amin for eight years.</s>

en: Museveni warned that anyone who has the ambition of becoming a dictator in Uganda would be pushed out.
lug: Museveni yalabula nti omuntu yenna alina ekiruubirirwa ky'okufuuka nnakyemalira mu Uganda ajja kusindiikirizibwa.
mt0: <pad> Museveni warned that anyone who has the ambition of becoming a dictator in Uganda will be pushed out.</s>

en: The categories laid down by Mozambican freedom fighters for their grades as criminals used by the freedom fighters against their colleagues.
lug: Engeri ez'enjawulo ezaateekebwawo ba Mozambican Freedom Fighters mu kubinjawaza emisango egikozesebwa abalwanirizi b'eddembe ku bannaabwe.
mt0: <pad> categories laid down by Mozambican freedom fighters for their grades as criminals used by the freedom fighters against their colleagues.</s>

en: Museveni declared amidst a laughter, that the question does not arise because Obote is welcome to join the movement.
lug: Musseveni yalangirira nga bw'aseka, nti ekibuuzo tekituukawo olw'okuba nti Obote ayanirizibwa mu mugendo.
mt0: <pad> Museveni yagambye, nga agikola omugumu, nti ekizibu tekikyuka kubanga Obote asaba kwegatta mu kibiina.</s>

en: Museveni stressed that membership is open to all.
lug: Museveni yakikaatiriza nti obwammemba buggule eri buli muntu.
mt0: <pad> Museveni stressed that membership is open to all.</s>

en: He said that cleanliness in leadership is one of the rarest commodities in Uganda.
lug: Agamba nti obwerufu mu bukulembeze kye kyamaguzi ekisinga obutalabika mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Okwagala mu buyinza ni kimwe mu bintu ebya Uganda ebitaggwaawo.</s>

en: The Uganda Patriotic Movement supports a mixed economy.
lug: Uganda Patriotic Movement ewagira ebyenfuna ebyesigamiziddwa ku bintu ebingi.
mt0: <pad> The Uganda Patriotic Movement supports a mixed economy.</s>

en: Museveni added that by capitalism, he did not mean those people who sell toilet paper and therefore call themselves capitalists.
lug: Museveni yagaseeko nti okugamba abagala enyo ensimbi yabadde tategeza abo abatunda ebikookooma ebizungu era n'olwekyo abayita abaagazi b'ensimbi.
mt0: <pad> Museveni added that by capitalism, he did not mean those people who sell toilet paper and therefore call themselves capitalists.</s>

en: Ugandans need to start manufacturing.
lug: Bannayuganda beetaaga okutandika okufulumya.
mt0: <pad> Ugandans need to start manufacturing.</s>

en: A man called Museveni was just an importer of shoes while another, Kasaija wanted to start producing shoes in Uganda.
lug: Omusajja ayitibwa Museveni yali musuubuzi wa ngatto ate ye omulala, Kasaija yali ayagala kutandika kukola ngatto mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Abantu babiri, Museveni na Kasaija, nti Uganda yalina obuva.</s>

en: The movement would encourage Kasaija because of the multiplier effect his enterprise would have on the economy.
lug: Ekibiina kijja kuzzaamu Kasaija amaanyi olw'amagezi amangi galina mu kutandikawo emirimu egivaamu ensimbi mu ggwanga.
mt0: <pad> Omuzanyo owagala Kasaija kubanga omulimu we wakola ebyo byagaba n'okukola mu butaka.</s>

en: It developed Europe from a backward old continent to a scientific economy.

en: In 1980, when it first contested elections, it was the Uganda Patriotic Movement political party.
lug: Mu 1980, lwe kyasooka okuvuganya mu kulonda kyali kiyitibwa Uganda Patriotic Movement Political Party.
mt0: <pad> Mu 1980, bwe yatandika kwetaba mu matora, yali Uganda Patriotic Movement political party.</s>

en: So does Ruhakana Rugunda.
lug: Ne Ruhakana Rugunda naye bw'atyo.

en: This means that the survival of National Resistance Movement depends on the existence of Museveni.

en: There are no permanent interests that hold the Movement together apart from the worship of Museveni's personality.
lug: Tewali bigendererwa bya lubeerera ebikuumira omugendo awamu okuggyako okugulumiza Museveni ng'omuntu.
mt0: <pad> No lasting interests that hold the Movement together apart from the worship of Museveni's personality.</s>

en: The things that held the Movement together from 1980 to 1986 have since faded away.
lug: Ebintu ebyali bikuumira ekibiina awamu okuva mu 1980 okutuuka mu 1986 okuva olwo byaseebengerera.
mt0: <pad> ebintu byakola ebyogera mu kugatta ekitundu ekyo mu 1980 kugeza 1986 byamaze okuba nga biva.</s>

en: President Museveni justified his 1981 rebellion because Milton Obote cheated in the 1980 elections
lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yawagira olutalo lwe yakola mu 1981 kubanga Milton Obote yabba mu kulonda kwa 1980.
mt0: <pad> President Museveni justified his 1981 rebellion because Milton Obote cheated in the 1980 elections.</s>

en: Milton Obote did this by using violence and intimidation against the opposition.
lug: Milton Obote yakola kino nga akozesa efujjo wamu n'okutiisatiisa ab'oludda oluvuganya.
mt0: <pad> Milton Obote yakola bino mu kukoresha ebyo ng'akoze ebyo n'okubangamira abatuuze.</s>

en: During his 25 year rule as president, the National Resistance Movement has failed to organise free and fair elections.
lug: Mu myaka abiri mu etaano gy'amaze ng'afuga nga pulezidenti, ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement kiremereddwa okutegeka akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya.
mt0: <pad> During his 25 year rule as president, the National Resistance Movement has failed to organise free and fair elections.</s>

en: The first presidential elections were held in 1996 ten years after he captured power in 1986.
lug: Akalulu k'obwapulezidenti akaasooka kaaliwo mu 1996 emyaka kkumi oluvannyuma ye okuwamba obuyinza mu 1986.
mt0: <pad> Elections for president were held in 1996 ten years after he captured power in 1986.</s>

en: During the election campaign, Museveni released his opponent, Paul Ssemogerere, who had no counterpart in the Great Lakes region.
lug: Mu biseera by'okunoonya akalulu, Museveni yata amuvuganya Paul Ssemogerere ataalina gwakolagana naye mu bitundu ebyetooloddwa ennyanja.
mt0: <pad> During the election campaign, Museveni released his opponent, Paul Ssemogerere, who had no counterpart in the Great Lakes region.</s>

en: In 2001, this political defeat led to the birth of a second Movement called the Reform Agenda.
lug: Mu 2001, okuwangulwa mu byobufuzi kuno kwaviirako okutondebwawo kw'omugendo ogwokubiri ogwayitibwanga Reform Agenda.
mt0: <pad> Mu 2001, ekibiina kino kyava mu kugwa kwa kitundu kyona ekyayitibwa agenda ya Reform.</s>

en: The second Movement comprised of deserters from the first Movement who were disgusted by the narrowing democratic space.
lug: Omugendo ogwokubiri gwalimu abo abaava mu mugendo ogwasooka abaali beetamidwa okunyigirizibwa.
mt0: <pad> The second movement comprises deserters from the first movement who were disgusted by the narrowing democratic space.</s>

en: It was led by Dr Kizza Besigye, a retired colonel who had formerly served as National Resistance Movement's national political supervisor.
lug: Kyali kikulemberwa Dr. Kizza Besigye kkano eyawummula eyali yaweerezaako mu National Resistance Movement ng'omutunuulizi w'ebyobufuzi.
mt0: <pad> It was led by Dr Kizza Besigye, a retired colonel who had formerly served as National Resistance Movement's national political supervisor.</s>

en: The Forum for Democratic Change also comprised other former National Resistance Movement members.
lug: Forum for Democratic Change nayo yalimu abaaliko bammemba ba National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> The Forum for Democratic Change also included other former National Resistance Movement members.</s>

en: The Reform Agenda was contesting power in the 2001 elections.
lug: Reform Agenda yali erwanira buyinza mu kulonda kwa 2001.
mt0: <pad> The Reform Agenda was contesting power in the 2001 elections.</s>

en: Besigye fled the country for four years and many of his supporters were also harrased out of the country.
lug: Besigye yafuluma eggwanga okumala emyaka ena era n'abawagizi be bangi nabo baatulugunyizibwa wabweru w'eggwanga.
mt0: <pad> Besigye yagenda mu buganda okumala emyaka ina, na bamu ku bagamba be nabo bamukubita.</s>

en: Besigye returned in 2005 for a second battle with Museveni and by 2006, the second Movement had grown in number and strength.
lug: Besigye yakomawo mu 2005 ku lutalo olwokubiri ne Museveni era mu 2006 omugendo ogwokubiri gwali guwezezza abantu n'amaanyi.
mt0: <pad> Besigye went back in 2005 for a second battle with Museveni and by 2006, the second Movement had grown in number and strength.</s>

en: The dissatisfied National Resistance Movement candidates had become discontented under the manner in which the 2006 election had been held.
lug: Aba National Resistance Movement abeesimbawo tebaali bamativu n'engeri okulonda kwa 2006 gye kwakolebwamu.
mt0: <pad> Abavuganya eby'obufuzi ba National Resistance Movement abaali batono ku ngeri y'okulonda kwa 2006 kwakolebwa.</s>

en: They claimed that the NRM 2006 party primaries had been rigged and decided to contest the general elections as independent candidates.
lug: Beemulugunya nti akamyufu ka NRM aka 2006 kaali kabiddwa era ne basalawo bavuganye mu kalulu ka bonna ku bwa nnamunigina.
mt0: <pad> They claimed that the NRM 2006 party primaries had been rigged and decided to contest the general elections as independent candidates.</s>

en: They remained loyal to the National Resistance Movement once they succeeded on individual merit.
lug: Baasigala bagondera National Resistance Movement kasita baayitiramu ku busobozi bwabwe nga ssekinoomu.
mt0: <pad> bwe baakola omulimu gw'okulwanagana mu Uganda, baali bakiriza nti bwe baakola omulimu gwabwe, baakola omulimu gwabwe.</s>

en: About ninety five percent of the thirty seven independent Members of Parliament are connected to the National Resistance Movement.
lug: Ebitundu ebikunukiriza kyenda mu bitaano ku kikumi ku babaka ba Paalamenti asatu mu musanvu abeesimbawo ku bwa nnamunigina balina akakwate ku National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> About ninety five percent of the thirty seven independent Members of Parliament are connected to the National Resistance Movement.</s>

en: A common political front challenged the National Resistance Movement existing condition.
lug: Ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekimanyikiddwa kyawakanyizza embeera National Resistance Movement gy'erimu.
mt0: <pad> A common political front challenged the National Resistance Movement's existing condition.</s>

en: They cannot stand up as a force to challenge Museveni for the state power today.
lug: Tebasobola kuvaayo nga eggye okuvuganya Museveni ku buyinza leero.
mt0: <pad> They can't stand up as a force to challenge Museveni for the state power today.</s>

en: There was recent chaos in the National Resistance Movement primaries.
lug: Waaliwo obuvuyo mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> Chaos recently in the National Resistance Movement primaries.</s>

en: They are cursing the National Resistance Movement for messing up the election.
lug: Bakolimira National Resistance Movement olw'okutabangula okulonda.
mt0: <pad> They are cursing the National Resistance Movement for messing up the election.</s>

en: As long as they are benefiting personally under the National Resistance Movement, they are willing to tolerate the rot and remain loyal.
lug: Kasita baba nga baganyulwa mu National Resistance Movement, beteefuteefu okukkiriza buli kimu n'okusigala nga beesimu.
mt0: <pad> As long as they are benefiting personally under the National Resistance Movement, they are willing to tolerate the rot and remain loyal.</s>

en: And for that reason Museveni and the National Resistance Movement will not treat them harshly.
lug: N'olwensonga eyo Museveni ne National Resistance Movement tebajja kubayisa bubi.
mt0: <pad> Naye nti Museveni ne National Resistance Movement tebakola nabo mu ngeri ey'okubanga.</s>

en: Democratic free and fair elections have never been a value dearly and deeply held by the National Resistance Movement.
lug: Okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya tekubeerangako kwa mugaso era tekutegekebwangako National Resistance Movement.
mt0: <pad> Democratic free and fair elections have never been a value dearly and deeply held by the National Resistance Movement.</s>

en: It has only been used to give the National Resistance Movement a democratic face in the public.
lug: Kikozeseddwa bukozesebwa okulaga abantu nti National Resistance Movement essa ekitiibwa mu mateeka.
mt0: <pad> It's been used only to give the National Resistance Movement a democratic face in the public.</s>

en: That's why it has been easy for the National Resistance Movement to abandon the 1980 promise of free and fair elections.
lug: Eyo y'ensonga lwaki kibadde kyangu National Resistance Movement obutatuukiriza kisuubizo kyayo ekya 1980 eky'akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya.
mt0: <pad> N'olwekyo nti kiba kyangudde nnyo ku National Resistance Movement okwewala ekirabo kye 1980 ekya Uganda eky'amazima n'amagezi.</s>

en: One of the values to which the National Resistance Movement has not withdrawn on is, joining of power.
lug: Ebimu ku bintu lwaki National Resistance Movement tevuddeko kwe kugatta obuyinza.
mt0: <pad> 1 Omu ku bintu eby'obutambara bw'obuwanguzi obw'amagezi buli mwaka bulina ekifo kimwe, nti bwe balinga mu ngeri y'okukola n'obufuzi.</s>

en: They pursued it as a matter of life and death through the bush war in 1981.
lug: Baagitwala ng'ensonga y'obulamu n'okufa mu lutalo lw'omunsiko mu 1981.
mt0: <pad> They pursued it as a matter of life and death through the bush war in 1981.</s>

en: The events in the recent National Resistance Movement primaries, Museveni did not go to the bush to fight Milton Obote for rigging elections.
