en: Mwenda wrote about it on Saturday evening June nineteenth.
lug: Mwenda yakiwandiikako olweggulo ku Lwomukaaga nga kkumi na mwenda Ogwomukaaga.
mt0: <pad> Mwenda yawandiika ebyo ku Lwakutaano mu kiro kya 17 Munyonyo.</s>

en: South African police arrested the first suspect in connection with the attempted murder of Lieutenant General Kayumba Nyamwasa.
lug: Poliisi y'e South Africa yakutte ateeberezebwa asooka mu lukwe lw'okugezaako okutta Lotonanti Genero Kayumba Nyamwasa.
mt0: <pad> Polisi y'e South Africa yafashe omusango wa mbere mu buferera bw'okugeza kuganda kwa Kayumba Nyamwasa.</s>

en: Lieutenant General Kayumba Nyamwasa who was a former Rwandan High Commissioner to India now turned revolutionary.
lug: Lotonanti Genero Kayumba Nyamwasa eyali kamisona wa Rwanda e India yafuuka muyeekera.
mt0: <pad> Lieutenant General Kayumba Nyamwasa, Rwandan High Commissioner to India, now became a revolutionary.</s>

en: The suspect was a retired Captain Francis Gakwerera, a businessman based in Mozambique but also a former soldier.
lug: Ateeberezebwa yali kaputeeni eyawummula Francis Gakwerera, omusuubuzi asinziira e Mozambique era eyaliko omujaasi.
mt0: <pad> Omuntu abiri mu bufere bw'abasirikare yategerezwa kuba Captain Francis Gakwerera, omugagga w'omu Mozambike ariko n'omuzirikali wa kera.</s>

en: Francis is a former soldier in the Ugandan, Rwandan army but he finally joined the Congolese army.
lug: Francis yali musirikale mu Uganda, mu magye g'e Rwanda naye ate oluvannyuma ne yeegatta ku magye g'e Congo.
mt0: <pad> Francis yahoze ari omusirikare mu gisirikare cy'Uganda, Rwanda naye yaje kujya mu gisirikare cy'aba Congo.</s>

en: Kayumba had a few months earlier escaped from Rwanda and launched a scathing criticism of President Paul Kagame and his government.
lug: Kayumba nga wayiseewo emyezi mitono emabega yali atolose e Rwanda n'atandika okukolokota okutaali kulungi ku Pulezidenti Paul Kagame ne gavumenti ye.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba amaze amezi make guhunga Rwanda, maze atangira kuvuga amagambo agabije ku mugaba wa mbere Paul Kagame n'ubuyobozi bwiwe.</s>

en: It seemed the Rwandan government was behind this attempted assassination.
lug: Kyalabika nga gavumenti ya Rwanda eyali emabega w'olukwe lw'obutemu buno.
mt0: <pad> It seemed the Rwandan government was behind this attempted assassination.</s>

en: Gakwerera's profile suggests that he was the right man for such a job.
lug: Ebikwata ku Gakwerera biraga nti ye yali omusajja omutuufu okukola omulimu ogwo.
mt0: <pad> Profile ya Gakwerera igaragaza ko ari umuntu mwiza ku kazi nk'iyo.</s>

en: He is a close family friend of Kayumba; so he knew the victim well.
lug: Mukwano gwa Kayumba ow'oku lusegere nolwekyo yali amanyi bulungi avunaanibwa.
mt0: <pad> He is a close family friend of Kayumba; so he knew the victim well.</s>

en: As a former combatant in three wars in three different countries, Gakwerera admits to having been a sniper.
lug: Nga omulwanyi w'entalo mu nsi ssatu ez'enjawulo, Gakwerera akkiriza okuba nti yali mukubi wa ssabaawa.
mt0: <pad> As a former combatant in three wars in three different countries, Gakwerera admits to having been a sniper.</s>

en: The relationship between Gakwerera and the Kayumba family was confirmed by Kayumba's wife, Rosette on her Facebook page.
lug: Enkolagana wakati wa Gakwerera n'amaka ga Kayumba yakakasibwa mukyala wa Kayumba Rosette ku kibanja kye ekya Facebook.
mt0: <pad> isano hagati ya Gakwerera na Kayumba yamenyeshejwe n'umugore wa Kayumba, Rosette ku rubuga rwe kuri Facebook.</s>

en: She said Gakwerera is a close friend of the family and could not have been involved in the attempted assassination of her husband.
lug: Yagamba nti Gakwerera mukwano gwa famire era yali tayinza kwetaba mu kwagala kutemula bbaawe.
mt0: <pad> Yagize ati Gakwerera ni mugenzi wa nnyumba kandi nti yashoboraga kuba ari we yafashije mu kugerageza kwica umugabo we.</s>

en: Gakwerera who was released after five days without any charges also denies involvement.
lug: Gakwerera eyateebwa nga wayiseewo ennaku ttaano nga tagguddwako misango gyonna naye yeegaana okwenyigiramu.
mt0: <pad> Gakwerera, amaze iminsi itanu atagiriwe ibirego, nawe yahakana uruhare rwe mu byo kubangamira.</s>

en: On Sunday, June twentieth, Kayumba's driver Richard Bachisha was also arrested in connection with the attempted assassination.
lug: Ku Sande, nga abiri Ogwomukaaga, omuvuzi wa Kayumba, Richard Bachisha naye yakwatibwa ku byekuusa ku kwenyigira mu butemu.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba's driver Richard Bachisha was also arrested on Sunday, June twelve, in connection with the attempted assassination.</s>

en: An interview with suspect Kayumba shooting showed the unresolved puzzle between Kayumba Nyamwasa and Paul Kagame before they fell out.
lug: Yintaaviyu eyakolebwa ku bateeberezebwa okukuba Kayumba amasasi yalaga nti waaliwo ensonga ezaali tezinnagonjoolwa wakati wa Kayumba Nyamwasa ne Paul Kagame nga banneeta.
mt0: <pad> An interview with suspect Kayumba shooting showed the unresolved puzzle between Kayumba Nyamwasa and Paul Kagame before they fell out.</s>

en: He was alongside two other Rwandese, one known as Saad and the other as Rukara.
lug: Yali wamu n'Abanyarwanda abalala babiri, omu amanyikiddwa nga Saad ate omulala nga ye Rukara.
mt0: <pad> Ayogeranye n'abanyarwanda babiri, omu yamenyekana nga Saad n'omulala nga Rukara.</s>

en: There were also two other suspects; one from Kenya, and the other from Tanzania.
lug: Waaliwo era n'abateeberezebwa abalala babiri, omu ng'ava Kenya, ate omulala ava Tanzania.
mt0: <pad> Abantu babiri abandi nabo bafunzwe; omu y'omu Kenya, n'uwundi y'omu Tanzania.</s>

en: The arrest of Bachisha was surprising given that he seemed loyal to his boss having helped him escape from Rwanda in the middle of the night.
lug: Okukwatibwa kwa Bachisha kwali kwewuunyisa kubanga yalabika ng'omwetowaze eri mukama we oluvannyuma lw'okumuyamba okutoloka e Rwanda mu masekkati g'ekiro.
mt0: <pad> Bachisha amaze gufatwa, yatunguwe cyane kubera ko yagaragaraga nk'uwa mutima n'umuyobozi we, amufashije kuva muri Ruanda mu gihe c'ijoro.</s>

en: He escaped from Rwanda on February twenty-eighth.
lug: Yatoloka okuva e Rwanda nga abiri mu munaana Ogwokubiri.
mt0: <pad> Yahungabanyirije Rwanda mu kwezi kwa cumi n'ebiri na munani.</s>

en: Bachisha was put in the same jail as Gakwerera.
lug: Bachisha yateekebwa mu kkomera lye limu nga Gakwerera.
mt0: <pad> Bachisha yashyizwe mu gereza imwe na Gakwerera.</s>

en: However, immediately they met, Bachisha poured out his heart to Gakwerera.
lug: Wabula, amangu ddala baasisinkana Bachisha n'abuulira Gakwerera byonna ebyamuli ku mutima.
mt0: <pad> However, immediately they met, Bachisha poured out his heart to Gakwerera.</s>

en: He claimed that after Bichisha arrived in South Africa, he was called on the telephone by someone claiming to be Doctor Ndahiro.
lug: Yategeeza nti oluvannyuma nga Bichisha atuuse e South Africa, yakubibwa essimu ey'omuntu eyeetwala okuba musawo Ndahiro.
mt0: <pad> yagambye nti amaze Bichisha kugera mu South Africa, yahamagawe ku telefone n'omuntu agamba nti ye Dr Ndahiro.</s>

en: Ndahiro asked him to kill Kayumba on behalf of the Rwandan government.
lug: Ndahiro yamusaba okutta Kayumba ku lwa gavumenti ya Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Ndahiro asked him to kill Kayumba on behalf of the Rwandan government.</s>

en: Ndahiro promised to pay him two thousand dollars for the job.
lug: Ndahiro yasuubiza okumusasula ddoola enkumi bbiri olw'omulimu.
mt0: <pad> Ndahiro promised to pay him two thousand dollars for the job.</s>

en: Bichisha claimed that he later met agents sent by this Doctor Ndahiro who gave him only six hundred dollars.
lug: Bichisha yagamba nti oluvannyuma yasisinkana ababaka abaasindikibwa musawo Ndahiro abaamuwa ddoola olukaaga zokka.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha claimed that he later met agents sent by this Doctor Ndahiro who gave him only six hundred dollars.</s>

en: It is here that Bichisha's story becomes even more intriguing.
lug: Wano emboozi ya Bichisha w'esingira ddala okunyuma.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha's story becomes even more intriguing here.</s>

en: He claimed that on Wednesday, June sixteenth, three days before Kayumba was shot, the killers came into Kayumba's house at night.
lug: Yategeezezza nti ku Lwokusatu nga kkumi na mukaaga Ogwomukaaga, ennaku ssatu nga Kayumba tannakubibwa masasi, abatemu bajja mu nnyumba ya Kayumba ekiro.
mt0: <pad> Okwa gatanu, omukubiri mbere ya Kayumba, abakoze ubwicanyi bamaze mu nzu ya Kayumba mu kiro.</s>

en: Bichisha told Gakwerera that Kayumba and his wife were sleeping in their bedroom.
lug: Bichisha yagamba Gakwerera nti Kayumba ne mukazi we baali beebase mu kisenge kyabwe.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha told Gakwerera that Kayumba and his wife were sleeping in their bedroom.</s>

en: According to Bichisha, the assassins left him their contact.
lug: Okusinziira ku Bichisha, abatemu baamulekera ennamba zaabwe.
mt0: <pad> According to Bichisha, the assassins left him their contact.</s>

en: He later telephoned them on Saturday, June nineteenth and told them that he was going to the shopping mall with Kayumba.
lug: Oluvannyuma yabakubira ku Lwomukaaga nga kkumi na mwenda ogwomukaaga n'abagamba nti yali agenda ku mmoolo ne Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> Awo amaze kubahamagara ku wa gatandatu, Ruheshi nindambwe nagamba nti yaje mu kibuga cy'amaguzi na Kayumba.</s>

en: As agreed, the killers showed up at the mall where one of them shot Kayumba in the stomach.
lug: Nga bwe kyali kikaanyiziddwako, abatemu bajja ku mmoolo era omu ku bo we yakubira Kayumba essasi mu lubuto.
mt0: <pad> As agreed, the killers showed up at the mall where one of them shot Kayumba in the stomach.</s>

en: Bichisha claims that later that day, Ndahiro called again and asked him to finish off Kayumba adding that this time Kagame had promised a reward.
lug: Bichisha agamba nti oluvannyuma ku lunaku olwo, Ndahiro yaddamu n'akuba essimu n'amusaba okutta Kayumba n'agattako nti ku mulundi ogwo Kagame yali asuubizza ekirabo.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha says that later that day, Ndahiro called again and asked him to finish off Kayumba adding that this time Kagame had promised a reward.</s>

en: This is the same story Bichisha later told the South African police and also recorded in his statement.
lug: Oluvannyuma eno y'emboozi y'emu Bichisha gye yabuulira poliisi y'e South Africa era n'akola ne sitatimenti ye.
mt0: <pad>.</s>

en: Bichisha also provided the telephone number from which Ndahiro called.
lug: Bichisha era yawaayo ennamba y'essimu Ndahiro gye yakubirako.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha also provided the number of Ndahiro's phone.</s>

en: The Chief of the National Security Services which is Rwanda's national intelligence arm is called Doctor Emmanuel Ndahiro.
lug: Akulira ebyokwerinda era nga kye kitongole ky'obukessi mu Rwanda ayitibwa Doctor Emmanuel Ndahiro.
mt0: <pad> Rwanda's National Security Services, which is the national intelligence arm, is called Doctor Emmanuel Ndahiro.</s>

en: Therefore, Bichisha seems to be referring to him.
lug: Nolwekyo, Bichisha alabika okuba nga gw'ajulizaako.
mt0: <pad> Therefore, Bichisha seems to be referring to him.</s>

en: First, if these professional assassins knew Kayumba's house and had special keys to enter it, then why did they need Bichisha?
lug: Ekisooka, singa abatemu bano abakugu baali bamanyi ennyumba ya Kayumba era nga baalina ebisumuluzo eby'enjawulo okugiyingira, olwo lwaki baali beetaaga Bichisha?
mt0: <pad> mbere, niba aba baganda b'abasirikari bamwebako Kayumba's house kandi bafise amafunguro magezi yo kwinjira mu kibuga, nti bakirega Bichisha?</s>

en: He seems to be a hindrance to their mission.
lug: Yalabika okuba omuziziko eri ekigendererwa kyabwe.
mt0: <pad> Okwa n'okulabira nga abakungubagidde mu bukola bwabwe.</s>

en: Second, Bichisha's description of the shooting incident is suspicious.
lug: Ekyokubiri, engeri Bichisha gy'annyonyolamu engeri amasasi gye gaakubwamu erimu okwekengera.
mt0: <pad> Kabiri, ebyo Bichisha byagamba ku ngeri y'okukola omulimu gwakubita ni bimugumu.</s>

en: He claims Mrs Kayumba later corroborated this story that a man approached their car as they left the mall and waved at them angrily to stop.
lug: Agamba nti oluvannyuma mukyala Kayumba yapanzeewo eno emboozi nti omusajja yatuukirira emmotoka yaabwe nga bavudde ku mmoolo ng'abayimiriza mu bukambwe.
mt0: <pad> 'Omuntu yatuuka ku motoka yabo nga bava mu mall, n'agamba nti mwe mutumire nti bwe mutumire.</s>

en: Bichisha stopped the car and opened the driver's window
lug: Bichisha yayimiriza emmotoka n'assa endabirwamu ku mukono gwa ddereeva.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha yatandika emotoka n'akola mu maaso g'omuvuzi.</s>

en: The man pulled out a pistol and shot once at Kayumba in the stomach.
lug: Omusajja yaggyayo pisito n'akuba Kayumba essasi limu mu lubuto.
mt0: <pad> Abantu babiri batera Kayumba mu mubiri.</s>

en: The man walked around the car to Kayumba's side where they wrestled for a while before the man fled.
lug: Omusajja yeetooloola emmotoka ku ludda okwaliko Kayumba gye baalwanira okumala akabanga ng'omusajja tannagenda.
mt0: <pad> Abantu babiri bateranye mu mmotoka ku Kayumba's side, abakubita omulundi ogw'obudde nga bamaze n'ebyo kumenyana mbere y'okuhunga.</s>

en: The second reason is that the heroic story of Kayumba wrestling the assassin sounds like a Hollywood movie.
lug: Ensonga ekyokubiri eri nti emboozi ya Kayumba ey'obuzira okulwana n'omutemu ewulikika nga ffirimu y'omu Hollywood.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba yagambye omuyizi n'amagezi, nti ekifananyi kye kiba kimeze nga kinonyonyi ya Hollywood.</s>

en: Is this really what happened or this is the version of events Kayumba, his wife and their driver wanted the world to hear?
lug: Kino ddala kye kyaliwo oba eno y'engeri Kayumba, mukyala we ne ddereeva waabwe gye baayagala ensi okubiwuliramu?
mt0: <pad> - "Nta kintu kimwe kyabadde, n'amazima Kayumba, umugore we n'abakozi be bashaka ko abantu bagenda mu Rwanda kumenya?"</s>

en: if Ndahiro wanted to kill Kayumba, would he telephone the General's driver whom he did not know and ask him to collaborate in the effort?
lug: Bwe kiba nga Ndahiro yali ayagala kutta Kayumba, yandikubidde ddereeva wa Genero gwe yali tamanyi n'amusaba bakwatagane mu nsonga eno?
mt0: <pad> Nti umanya niba Ndahiro yashakaga gukuba Kayumba, yaba yahamagara omuvuzi wa General uwo atamenya n'asaba ko akorana mu gikorwa?</s>

en: If what Kayumba's driver is saying is true, was someone impersonating Ndahiro?
lug: Bwe kiba nga ddereeva wa Kayumba ky'ayogera kituufu, waliwo eyali attattana erinnya lya Ndahiro?
mt0: <pad> If what Kayumba's driver is saying is true, was someone impersonating Ndahiro?</s>

en: The fourth reason is that there is no evidence linking Bichisha to those who tried to kill Kayumba.
lug: Ensonga eyookuna eri nti tewaliiwo bukakafu bukwasaganya Bichisha n'abo abagezaako okutta Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> Nsonga ya kane ni nti tewaba na bubonero bugaragaza ko Bichisha yagendaga kubanga Kayumba.</s>

en: Even if he was involved, why was he so willing to implicate himself in a case of attempted murder that in South Africa carries up to twenty years in jail?
lug: Ne bwe kiba nga yalimu, lwaki yali ayagala nnyo okwewaayo mu musango gw'okugezaako okutemula ogusibya omuntu mu kkomera okumala emyaka abiri mu South Africa.
mt0: <pad> N'obwoba nti yalina omukono, lwaki yali agenderera okukola ebyo bye yalinga mu kitundu ky'okugezaako okukola omulimu ogw'obutujju eky'omu South Africa ekyo ekiyinza okukubira emyaka 20 mu jere?</s>

en: Gakwerera claims Bichisha's story sounded rehearsed.
lug: Gakwerera agamba nti emboozi ya Bichisha yawulikika ng'empangirire.
mt0: <pad> Gakwerera claims Bichisha's story sounded rehearsed.</s>

en: To whom was Bichisha working?
lug: Bichisha yali akolera ani?
mt0: <pad> Bichisha yali akora eri ani?</s>

en: Security experts say Bichisha could have been a mole planted inside the prison by South African police to gather information from other suspects.
lug: Abakugu mu byokwerinda bagamba nti Bichisha ayinza okuba nga yali asimbidda poliisi y'e South Africa okufuna amawulire ku bateeberezebwa abalala.
mt0: <pad> Experts on security say Bichisha could have been a mole planted by South African police inside the prison to collect information from other suspects.</s>

en: But there is another twist in the Kayumba shooting incident that places South African authorities in credibility problems.
lug: Naye waliwo enkyukakyuka mu musango gwa Kayumba ogw'okuba amasasi oguteeka abobuyinza ba South Africa mu buzibu bw'okwesigibwa.
mt0: <pad> But there is another twist in the Kayumba shooting incident that puts South African authorities in credibility problems.</s>

en: Bichisha entered South Africa on a Ugandan passport issued on April twenty-first two thousand ten.
lug: Bichisha yayingira South Africa ng'akozesa paasipooti ya Uganda eyafuluma nga abiri mu lumu Ogwokuna enkumi bbiri mu kkumi.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha yagenda mu South Africa ku Ugandan passport eyakola nga 21 April 2010</s>

en: It is this passport that Bichisha used when identifying himself before the South African police.
lug: Pasipooti eno Bichisha gye yakozesa nga yeeyanjula eri poliisi y'e South Africa.
mt0: <pad> Bichisha y'akoze ekirabo kino bwe yatambulanga eri poliisi y'omumaserengeta.</s>

en: Yet in all their press releases, the South African police have never revealed that one of the suspects is Ugandan.
lug: Kyokka ate mu biwandiiko ebirala bye baawa bannamawulire, poliisi y'e South Africa tefulumyangako nti omu ku bateeberezebwa Munnayuganda.
mt0: <pad> N'olwo mu nkola zabwe zose, abapolisi ba South Africa tebagamba nti omu ku bagoberera Uganda ni Omuganda.</s>

en: Gakwerera claims Bichisha's story sounded rehearsed.
lug: Gakwerera agamba nti emboozi ya Bichisha yawulikika ng'empangirire.
mt0: <pad> Gakwerera claims Bichisha's story sounded rehearsed.</s>

en: Those arrested in connection with the shooting claimed that they had been approached by people who claimed that Kayumba had killed their relatives.
lug: Abo abaakwatibwa mu lukwe lw'okukuba amasasi baagamba nti baali batuukiriddwa abantu abaali bagamba nti Kayumba yali asse abenganda zaabwa.
mt0: <pad> Twakola nti Kayumba yafashije mu kubanga abantu bamwe bavuga ko Kayumba yafaga abavandimwe babo.</s>

en: Kayumba was head of Rwanda's National Security Services, the state's intelligence agency.
lug: Kayumba ye yali akulira ebyokwerinda by'e Rwanda, ekitongole ky'eggwanga ekikessi.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba yari umuyobozi wa National Security Services ya Rwanda, ikigo cy'ubutabazi cya leta.</s>

en: These people paid them money to kill Kayumba.
lug: Abantu bano baabasasula ssente okutta Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> abantu baabatadde mu maguzi kubanga Kayumba yali amaze gupfa.</s>

en: However, these Rwandans claimed, since they had been paid in advance, they took the money but did nothing.
lug: Wabula, Abanyarwanda bano baagamba nti olw'okuba nti baali basasuddwa nga tebannakola mulimu, baatwala ssente naye tebalina kye baakola.
mt0: <pad> Ariko, aba Rwandans bavuga ko, kubera ko bari bamaze kwishyurwa mu maguru masha, bafashe amafaranga ariko ntibagikoze kintu na kimwe.</s>

en: The two Rwandan suspects are actually known petty criminals.
lug: Abanyarwanda babiri abateeberezebwa bamanyiddwa ng'abazzi b'emisango emitonotono.
mt0: <pad> Abagabo babiri b'Abanyarwanda bavugwa ko ari abagizi ba nabi.</s>

en: The Rwanda government had applied for their extradition accusing them of breaking into its High Commission in Pretoria and stealing property.
lug: Gavumenti y'e Rwanda yali esabye baddizibweyo e Pretoria oluvannyuma lw'okumenya ekitebe kya Pretoria ne babba ebintu.
mt0: <pad> The Rwanda government had requested their extradition accusing them of breaking into its High Commission in Pretoria and stealing property.</s>

en: South African authorities had been dragging their feet on the case.
lug: Aboobuyinza mu South Africa baali babalinnya kagere olw'emisango gyabwe.
mt0: <pad> Ugandan authorities had been dragging their feet on the case.</s>

en: There has been a lot of politics in Kayumba's case.
lug: Mubaddemu ebyobufuzi bingi mu musango gwa Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba amaze kugwa mu bufero bwa politiki.</s>

en: First, on the day he was shot, the deputy president of South Africa showed up at the hospital where Kayumba had been admitted.
lug: Okusookera ddala, ku lunaku lwe yakubwa amasasi, amyuka Pulezidenti wa South Africa yalabikako mu ddwaliro Kayumba gye yali aweereddwa ekitanda.
mt0: <pad> omuntu awamu, ku munsi Kayumba yagwa, omuyizi wa South Africa yaje mu bitaro bye Kayumba yali agulirwa.</s>

en: He was joined by South Africa's former chief spy, Bill Masetera, a close friend of Patrick Karegyeya also a dissident with Kayumba.
lug: Yeegattibwako eyali akulira bambega e South Africa, Bill Masetera mukwano ennyo gwa Patrick Karegyeya bwe bali ennyo ku mbiranye ne Kayumba.
mt0: <pad> He was joined by former South African spy Bill Masetera, a close friend of Patrick Karegyeya also a dissident with Kayumba.</s>

en: Masetera was the head of South Africa's National Intelligence Agency when Karegyeya was Rwanda's director of External Security.
lug: Masetera ye yali akulira ekitongole ekikessi mu South Africa Karegyeya gye yali akulira ebyokwerinda wabweru wa South Africa.
mt0: <pad> Masetera yari umuyobozi wa National Intelligence Agency ya South Africa ubwo Karegyeya yari Director of External Security ya Ruwanda.</s>

en: Masetera later became a security advisor to former South African president, Thabo Mbeki.
lug: Masetera oluvannyuma yafuuka omuwabuzi ku byokwerinda ow'eyaliko pulezidenti wa South Africa, Thabo Mbeki.
mt0: <pad> Masetera yagaruka agali omukugu mu byokwerinda wa Kabaka Thabo Mbeki.</s>

en: The two fell out over allegations that Masetera was secretly enhancing the power of Mbeki's main rival and current president, Jacob Zuma.
lug: Ababiri baalemagana oluvannyuma lw'ebigambibwa nti Masetera nti yali ayongedde amaanyi mu mulabe wa Mbeki asingayo era Pulezidenti aliko, Jacob Zuma.
mt0: <pad> Two went out over allegations that Masetera was secretly enhancing the power of Mbeki's main rival and current president, Jacob Zuma.</s>

en: Masetera's relationship with Karegyeya became stronger as, he now claims, presidents tend to use and dump their intelligence chiefs.
lug: Enkolagana ya Masetera ne Karegyeya yeeyongera nga bw'agamba kati, nti bapulezidenti batera okukozesa abakulira obukessi ate bwe bamala ne babasuulawo.
mt0: <pad> Masetera's relationship with Karegyeya became stronger as, he now claims, presidents tend to use and dump their intelligence chiefs.</s>

en: What was Museveni's game plan in this Kayumba saga?
lug: Museveni yalina ntekateeka ki ku bino ebyatuuka ku Kayumba?
mt0: <pad> What was Museveni's game plan in this Kayumba saga?</s>

en: As top Rehabilitation Project Force officials pondered this issue, "a friend" from the American Central Intelligence Agency called Kigali.
lug: Abakulira pulojekiti y'okuddaabiriza balowooza nnyo ku nsonga eno, "Owoomukwano" okuva mu  American Central Intelligence Agency ayitibwa Kigali.
mt0: <pad> As top Rehabilitation Project Force officials pondered this issue, "a friend" from the American Central Intelligence Agency called Kigali.</s>

en: He claimed that Kayumba had sent a message to Museveni seeking contact.
lug: Yategeeza nti Kayumba yali asindikidde Museveni obubaka ng'asaba bakolagane.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba yagamba nti yatumire omukutu Museveni asaba okumuvugana.</s>

en: Francis Gakwerera says he lives in Mozambique where he has been running a business since two thousand five.
lug: Francis Gakwerera agamba nti abeera mu Mozambique gy'abadde addukanyiza bizinensi okuva mu enkumi bbiri mu etaano.
mt0: <pad> Francis Gakwerera says he lives in Mozambique where he has been running a business since 2005.</s>

en: However, whenever I am travelling between Maputo and Kigali, I travel through South Africa.
lug: Wabula, buli lwe mbeera ntambulira wakati wa Maputo ne Kigali, mpitira mu South Africa.
mt0: <pad> However, whenever I am travelling between Maputo and Kigali, I travel through South Africa.</s>

en: I also buy things from South Africa which I sell in Mozambique.
lug: Era ngula ebintu e South Africa bye ntunda e Mozambique.
mt0: <pad> Nkwagura ebintu okuva mu South Africa ebikola mu Mozambike.</s>

en: How did you get arrested in relation to shooting Kayumba?
lug: Wajja otya okukwatibwa ku byekuusa ku musango gw'okukuba Kayumba amasasi?
mt0: <pad> How did you get arrested in relation to shooting Kayumba?</s>

en: I was in South Africa in transit to Maputo.
lug: Nali mu South Africa nga ngenda Maputo.
mt0: <pad> Nnali mu South Africa mu nzira ngenda Uganda.</s>

en: I had some business to do in South Africa and also to find a place in a boarding school for my child.
lug: Nalina bizinensi ey'okukola mu South Africa n'okufuna ekifo ky'omwana wange mu ssomero ly'ekisulo.
mt0: <pad> Nnali nnina ebintu by'okukola mu Bulaaya n'okunoonyereza omwana wange mu masomero ag'amagezi.</s>

en: I use South Africa for many things.
lug: Nkozesa South Africa mu bintu bingi.
mt0: <pad> Nkoze South Africa mu bintu bingi.</s>

en: I arrived Wednesday and was arrested on Saturday.
lug: Nnatuuka ku Lwokusatu ne nkwatibwa ku Lwomukaaga.
mt0: <pad> Njagera ku wa gatatu n'okukwatiddwa ku wa mukaaga.</s>

en: The police accused me of being the person who shot Kayumba.
lug: Poliisi yanvunaana ogw'okubeera omuntu eyakuba Kayumba amasasi.
mt0: <pad> Polisi yambwira ko ndi umuntu y'akola Kayumba.</s>

en: Do you know Kayumba and do the two of you have historical wrangles?
lug: Omanyi Kayumba era mwembiriri mubadde n'obukuubagano okuva edda?
mt0: <pad> - Do you know Kayumba and do the two of you have historical wrangles?</s>

en: I first met Kayumba in Kitgum in one thousand eighty-seven when he was the Assistant District Administrator.
lug: Nasooka kusisinkana Kayumba e Kitgum mu lukumi kinaana mu musanvu bwe yali akola nga amyuka akulira disitulikiti.
mt0: <pad> Kayumba ndamumenya bwa mbere mu Kitgum mu 1987 bwe yali omukozi w'ekitundu.</s>

en: I was a sergeant in the nineteenth Battalion of the National Riffle Association which is currently call Uganda Peoples Defence Force.
lug: Nali ssajenti mu kibinja ky'abayeekera eky'ekkumi n'omwenda ekya National Riffle Association leero ekiyitibwa Uganda People's Defence Force.
mt0: <pad> Nnali sergeant mu battalion ya nineteenth ya National Riffle Association eyali Uganda Peoples Defence Force eyali Uganda.</s>

en: In 1990 we shifted together to Gulu.
lug: Mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda twadda ffenna e Gulu.
mt0: <pad> Mu 1990 twava mu Gulu mwembi.</s>

en: On 1st October 1990, we drove in the same motor vehicle to Kagitumba when the Rehabilitation Project Force was launching the struggle.
lug: Nga I Ogwekkumi 1990, twatambulira mu mmotoka emu okugenda e Kigitumba nga Rehabilitation Project Force etongoza olutabaalo.
mt0: <pad> Naye nti n'omuntu atamenya. Ku wa 1 Okutembera 1990, twagende mu motoka yomwe mu Kagitumba ubwo abakozi ba Rehabilitation Project Force baali batandika urugamba.</s>

en: Low returns in the photographic film industry, for instance, are the result of a superior substitute product as Kodak and Fuji.
lug: Okufuna ekitono mu bya ffirimu, okugeza, olw'okubaawo ebintu ebirala ebirungi ebiyinza okweyambisibwa nga Kodak ne Fuji.
mt0: <pad> Low returns in the photographic film industry, for example, are the result of a superior substitute product such as Kodak and Fuji.</s>

en: After making giant strides in a series of highly successful projects in Mozambique, Lebanon, Morocco and Ethiopia, CinemArena is finally in Uganda.
lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okukozesebwa obulungi mu pulojekiti ezaatambula obulungi Mozambique, Lebanon, Morocco ne Ethiopia, ekisaawe ky'ebya ffirimu kimaze ne kituuka mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> Kino kiba Uganda.</s>

en: CinemArena in Uganda is doing its rounds in social transformation, thanks to the Italian cooperation and Amakula Film.
lug: Ekisaawe ky'ebya ffirimu mu Uganda kyetooloolera ku kukyusa mbeera z'abantu, okusiima kugende eri Italian cooperation ne Amakula Film.
mt0: <pad> CinemArena mu Uganda ikoze ebyo kugira n'amagezi mu guhindura abantu, kubera okubagana kwayo n'Abataliyana n'Amakukula Film.</s>

en: So excited are the locals in Gulu, where the project is currently operating that they not only move considerable distances to the chosen locations.
lug: Musanyufu nnyo n'abantu b'e Gulu pulojekiti gy'eddukanyizibwa nti tebakoma bukomi ku kutambula ngendo mpanvu okugenda mu bifo bye baagala.
mt0: <pad> Abantu b'omu Gulu, ahantu ekibuga kikikola, bavuga nti ntibagende ebyo bya kure nnyo mu bifo byawe.</s>

en: The locals in Gulu brave the cold of the night till as late as midnight.
lug: Abantu b'e Gulu bavumu mu obunnyogovu bw'ekiro okutuukira ddala mu matumbi budde.
mt0: <pad> Abamu ku bantu b'omu Gulu bagumiikiriza omuzira w'ekiro mpaka mu kiro kireetawo.</s>

en: CinemArena is an initiative funded by the Embassy of Italy Development Cooperation office.
lug: Ekisaawe ky'ebya ffirimu kivujjirirwa ekitebe kya Italy Development Cooperation office.
mt0: <pad> CinemArena ni ekimu ekifo ekikozebwa n'ekibiina ky'amagye g'omu Italie.</s>

en: A traveller caravan travels around rural and remote areas of Uganda.
lug: Emmotoka y'abasuubuzi etambula yeetooloola ekibuga n'ebitundu by'ekyalo mu Uganda.
mt0: <pad> A traveller caravan travels around rural and remote areas of Uganda.</s>

en: The traditional Acholi dancers that entertain the crowds through the day's programme add a good flavour to the mix.
lug: Abazinyi abazina amazina Amacholi basanyusa abantu ku nnaku ez'okukola bongera okunyumisa ekintu.
mt0: <pad> The traditional Acholi dancers who entertain the crowds through the day's programme add a good flavour to the mix.</s>

en: The organisers of the project say that their communication medium is kin to Barak Obama's "Yes We Can" campaign slogan that saw him rise to office.
lug: Abategesi ba pulojekiti bagamba nti omukutu gwabwe ogw'empuliziganya gwekuusa ku ngombo ya Baraka Obama eya "Yes We Can" eyamuyamba okutuuka mu woofiisi.
mt0: <pad> Abakola ebiragiro bavuga nti ekitundu ky'okukozesa ekifananyi na Barak Obama's "Yes We Can" campaign slogan eyatumye atwalibwa mu buyobozi.</s>

en: Marco Ballerini, the project manager said that doing so will equip people with skills that will lead to future developments.
lug: Marco Ballerini, akulira pulojekiti yagambye nti mu kukola ekyo abantu abalina obukugu bajja kukulemberamu enkulaakulana y'omu maaso.
mt0: <pad> Marco Ballerini, the project manager said that doing so will equip people with skills that will lead to future developments.</s>

en: The project that is to happen in over twenty sub-counties in Gulu district started on June twenty-fifth and ends on July twenty-fifth.
lug: Pulojekiti egenda okukolebwa mu magombolola agasukka amakumi abiri mu disitulikiti y'e Gulu yatandika nga abiri mu ttaano Ogwomukaaga era ya kukomekkerezebwa ng'abiri mu ttaano Ogwomusanvu.
mt0: <pad> The project which is to happen in over twenty sub-counties in Gulu district began on June 25th and ends on July 25th.</s>

en: The locals in Gulu communities where the project is currently happening are so excited.
lug: Abantu b'omu bitundu by'e Gulu pulojekiti gyeeri mu kukolebwa kati basanyufu nnyo.
mt0: <pad> Abamu ku bibuga bya Gulu ebyo ekitundu kiba kikikola mu kitundu ekyo bamanyi nnyo.</s>

en: They pointed out that some of their colleagues were integrated into the Uganda People's Defense Force.
lug: Baanokolayo nti abamu ku bannaabwe baayingizibwa eggye lya Uganda People's Deforce Force.
mt0: <pad> They pointed out that some of their colleagues were integrated into the Uganda People's Defense Force.</s>

en: Others were attached to various security agencies helping operational networking, and sensitization of the Moslem community.
lug: Abalala baalina ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda bye baalinako akakwate ebyabayambanga okulondoola n'okumanyisa Abasiraamu.
mt0: <pad> Abantu abalala baakolagana n'amakolero g'ebyokwerinda, n'okumanya abantu mu kitundu kya Muslim.</s>

en: Two Allied Democratic Forces members Kakooza Ahmad and Dada Mukibi were denied loan access.
lug: Bammemba ba Allied Democratic Forces babiri, Kakooza Ahmad ne Dada Mukibi bammiddwa looni.
mt0: <pad> Two members of the Allied Democratic Forces, Kakooza Ahmad and Dada Mukibi, were denied access to loans.</s>

en: The office of Arrest Search Surveillance and Tracking at Kitante which played a role in liaising ADF networking was no longer operational.
lug: Woofiisi ekola ku kunoonyereza n'okulondoola e Kitante eyali ekola ku kutabaganya enkola za ADF yali tekyakola.
mt0: <pad> Office of Arrest Search Surveillance and Tracking at Kitante which played a role in liaising ADF network was no longer operational.</s>

en: In the process of working for the government, their lives have been increasingly put at risk by fellow Allied Democratic Forces still in the bush.
lug: Mu kukola ne Gavumenti, obulamu bwabwe bubadde bwongedde okuteekebwa mu katyabaga okuva eri bannaabwe ba Allied Democratic Forces abakyali mu nsiko.
mt0: <pad> Mu ngeri y'okukola mu gavumenti, bamanyi ba Allied Democratic Forces bamaze okuteeka omusango ku mitima gyabwe.</s>

en: They talked about the untimely death of their colleagues like Lyavaala, Zilyawulawo, Junju, Kasakya, Issa Twatera, Benon Musisi, Kagimu.
lug: Baayogera ku kufa kw'ekibwatukira okwa bannaabwe nga Lyavaale, Zilyawulawo, Junju, Kasakya, Issa Twatera, Benon Musisi, Kagimu.
mt0: <pad> They talked about the untimely death of their colleagues like Lyavaala, Zilyawulawo, Junju, Kasakya, Issa Twatera, Benon Musisi, Kagimu.</s>

en: Some of their colleagues were mysteriously killed and some former Allied Democratic Forces rebels warned of a return to terror activities.
lug: Abamu ku bannaabwe battibwa mu ngeri etaategeerekeka era abamu ku baaliko abayeekera ba Allied Democratic Forces baatiisatiisa okuttukiza ebikolwa y'obutujju.
mt0: <pad> Abantu bamwe mu bakozi babo bafunye eby'enjawulo, n'abasirikale abaasooka okwerinda bamanyi nti abantu bagenda kugaruka mu bufero.</s>

en: In October 2008 heads of security agencies met to discuss the issue of former ADF rebels who were accusing the government of using them.
lug: Mu Gwekkumi gwa 2008, abakulira ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda baasisinkana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'abaliko abayeekera ba ADF balumiriza gavumenti okubakozesa.
mt0: <pad> Mu Okutobala 2008 abakulembeze b'amagye baasanyizibwa mu kuteesa ekizibu kya baganda ba ADF abaali bagamba nti gavumenti yabatwaza.</s>

en: Former Allied Democratic Forces rebels accused the government of using them and dumping them without pay.
lug: Abaaliko abayeekera ba Allied Democratic Forces baalumizizza gavumenti okubakozesa n'ebasuulawo nga tebasasudde.
mt0: <pad> Abasirikale ba Allied Democratic Forces baakola ekibiina kyabwe n'okubanga mu buganda nga batabagaba.</s>

en: The July 11 terror bombings in Kampala were attributed to the joint network of ADF and Somalia based Al-Shabaab Islamic militants.
lug: Obulumbanyi bwa bbomu obwali mu Kampala nga 11 Ogwomusanvu bwava ku nkolagana wakati wa ADF ne bamukwatammundu Abasiraamu aba Al-Shabaab abasangibwa e Somalia.
mt0: <pad> The July 11 terror bombings in Kampala were attributed to the joint network of ADF and Somalia-based Al-Shabaab Islamic militants.</s>

en: Because of the harsh and miserable living conditions, some desperate Allied Democratic Forces reporters have been lured back into the rebel activities.
lug: Olw'embeera enzibu era ey'okwennyamira gye bawangaaliramu, bannamawulire ba Allied Democratic Forces abatamanyi kiddako baddiziddwa mu bikolwa by'obutujju.
mt0: <pad> Because of the harsh and miserable living conditions, some desperate Allied Democratic Forces reporters have been lured back into the rebel activities.</s>

en: Abdusalam Lukwebe Mwebe and others are some of the former members of the Allied Democratic Forces.
lug: Abdusalam Lukwebe Mwebe n'abalala be bamu ku baali bammemba ba Allied Democratic Forces.
mt0: <pad> Abdusalam Lukwebe Mwebe and others are some of the former members of the Allied Democratic Forces.</s>

en: The Independent of July 2010 reports that the deceased ADF family members are not getting support and yet their husbands died while on state duty.
lug: Independent w'Ogomusanvu, 2010, yawandiika nti abooluganda b'abaaliko mmemba wa ADF tebafuna buyambi kyokka ng'abaami baabwe baafiira ku mirimu gya Gavumenti.
mt0: <pad> The Independent of July 2010 reports that the families of the deceased ADF are not getting support and yet their husbands died while on state duty.</s>

en: Kampala City Council Authority is always emphasizing cleanliness among residents of Kampala.
lug: Kampala City Council Authority lubeerera ekubiriza bannakampala okuba abayonjo.
mt0: <pad> Kampala City Council Authority is always stressing cleanliness among the residents of Kampala.</s>

en: The move has landed their colleagues like Rwigyema Shafik and Tumusiime Hassan in problems.
lug: Ekino kiviiriddemu bannaabwe nga Rwigyema Shafik ne Tumusiime Hassan ebuzibu.
mt0: <pad> Ugandans like Rwigyema Shafik and Tumusiime Hassan have been in trouble.</s>
